1141111.content:
School was out. He couldn't believe it. All he had done that year was now behind him, and it was finally time to kick back and relax. It was finished. Over. Done. And you know what? He felt pretty darn good about it. Anthony practically floated home that June afternoon, thinking about all the video games he could play and all of the TV he could watch, and best of all, all of the homework he wouldn't have to do this summer! Anthony turned and looked to his right. He saw his house, a small two-story that wasn't much to look at. Just a normal house. But, who could complain? He reached into his pocket and pulled out the key to the front door, and put it in the lock. After having some trouble getting the door open, he stepped inside and shut and locked it behind him. He dropped his book bag and raced upstairs, just so excited that school was finally out!

Anthony soon reached the door to his room. He opened it, stepped inside, and leaped onto the bed. He just lay there for a while, doing nothing but stare at the ceiling. After a while, he decided to play some Super Mario. Anthony was a very confident gamer and an expert when it comes to video game history and backstory. (Something that didn't give him a lot of recognition at school, mind you.) Anthony opened up his Nintendo DS, and plugged in Super Mario. He started playing the classic 2-D scroller, enjoying every bit of it. After a few hours of playing, Anthony eventually beat Bowser and saved Princess Peach. Anthony stared at the screen. Now THAT was a girl he wanted to meet! Flowing blonde hair, big blue eyes, a crown on her head and a pink dress giving her that elegant look he loved so much...

"Man," Anthony thought aloud, "I wish Princess Peach was real..." Anthony suddenly felt a little sick. He assumed it was nothing, just sitting on a bed playing video games too long, he supposed. But it wasn't just that, and he knew it. His stomach rumbled. Something was definitely wrong. It may have been that apple he had had earlier, but there was no way that was the cause...was there? He felt like he had to throw up, and he did. He jumped off the bed and ran to the bathroom. (Insert graphic description of a boy throwing up a small pink egg out of his stomach here.)

If YOU wish to continue this story from this point forward, click the second option. If you want to continue reading the story as I have written it, click the first option. And please, DON'T CLICK THE FIRST OPTION UNTIL I HAVE WRITTEN THAT CHAPTER. Thank you.
1141111.title: School's Out!

11411111.content:
Anthony opened his eyes, then quickly shut them. He knew that if he opened them again, he would probably see a hideous mass of vomit in his bathroom toilet. Even so, he second guessed himself and opened one eye. What he saw surprised him. There was no vomit, barf, or icky green stuff to be seen. All Anthony saw in the toilet bowl was an egg. The egg was pink, with waves of a lighter shade of pink going down in a pattern from the center of the egg. On the front of the egg was a big blue jewel, and to top it all off, a dainty crown was attached to the top.

"What the hell?" Anthony said as he reached into the toilet and pulled out the egg. "What is this? Did this...come out of me?" Anthony was very confused. He walked back into his room and shut the door behind him. Sitting down on the bed, he examined the egg more closely. He looked it over a few times, turned it on its side, upside down, and every which way you can think of. After nearly five minutes of looking at this egg, he was still clueless. "Man, what is this thing? And how did it get here?" He asked himself. "I wish someone would give me some answers."

Suddenly, the egg in Anthony's hand began to vibrate. He tried to hold on to it, but it shook so violently that it eventually popped out of his hand and fell on the floor. Anthony Then watched as the egg stood upright and began to crack, shafts of light peeking out of the cracks. All at once the egg shattered, sending molten egg shells flying in every direction. At the same time, a ball of light rose out of what remained of the egg and filled the whole room with a blinding flash of...well, light.

"Whoa!" Anthony said as he shielded his eyes. He tried to look back, but he was almost blinded by the light. (Wow, that's an OLD song right there...) He decided to keep his eyes shut until he knew the brightness had dimmed enough so that he could see. After about five minutes, Anthony looked back. The blinding light had subsided, leaving only...Princess Peach!

"What?" Anthony couldn't believe his eyes! Could it be? Princess Peach? Here? In his bedroom? What could this mean? He turned his head slightly and looked at the princess' face. Her eyes were shut, almost as if she was dreaming. Anthony waved his hand in front of her face to see if she would react. Nothing. He tried snapping his fingers in front of her face, same response. But when he tried to poke her nose, she moved back, making Anthony jump with surprise. Peach's eyes suddenly opened. Anthony looked into her eyes. He gasped. Both of her eyes were nothing short of demon-like; bright blue with no pupils to be seen. She then looked directly at Anthony. He took a few steps back, but remained silent with minute shock and fear.

"Greetings, human," Peach said. Anthony turned his head, now curious. Still kind of scared, but curious. She didn't sound like Princess Peach. Her voice was sharp and smooth, nothing like Peach's dainty girly voice. And why did she refer to him as 'human?'

"I can see from the expression on your face that you are very confused," Peach said.

"You could say that," Anthony cautiously replied.

"All can be explained. You see, that apple you had yesterday was no ordinary apple. It was a magic apple."

"What? Like Snow White?" Peach giggled.

"No, not quite. The apple itself was just a regular apple. It's the seed that was inside the apple that made it a magic apple. You swallowed that seed, Anthony. And that seed has given you superhuman powers."

"It has?"

"Yes."

"Like what?"

"That seed has been absorbed into your very being, and has given you the ability to spawn physical projections of fictional beings. Female beings, I might add. If you think about a girl that exists only in fiction, you will then spit out an egg, and from that egg will come the being that you thought of. For example, you thought of Princess Peach. And here she is," She said, gesturing to herself. "Of course, this is just Peach's body. I have taken her over to explain to you your new gift."

"And who are you?" Anthony asked.

"I am the Mother of the Seed. At least, that is my full title. You can call me MS. I have possessed Princess Peach and am speaking through her. You may have noticed my...bright blue eyes."

"Yeah, they're not that hard to miss." MS laughed.

"Ah, well. We got a little off topic for a moment, but I still have more to tell you."

"Oh, really?"

"Yes. You see, you can only spit out a certain amount of eggs before your throat gets too irritated to do so. And if you push yourself too hard, you might just choke to death."

"Ouch."

"But, generating eggs is not your only power. You can also turn into a liquid from and enter any girl, real or not, through any opening in her body."

"Enter them?"

"Yes, enter them and possess them, much like I am possessing Peach. And unlike me, when you possess someone, it will be unnoticable."

"Okay? What can I do when I possess someone?"

"You can change their personality, control their thoughts, turn them into living puppets, make them say what you want them to say, even make them your slave!"

"Whoa," Anthony said, shocked.

"Yes. Anyone who is hatched from an egg that you summon is already bound to your soul, so they will already be your slave. They will do whatever you tell them to do. When you turn a real girl into your slave, the same thing happens."

"Neat."

"Yes. And if you should choose to undo anything I just mentioned, you can."

"Awesome!" The posssessed Peach's face suddenly turned grim.

"But, before I can let you use these powers that fate has given you, you must tell me for what purpose you intend to use these powers: Good? Or Evil?

MS laughed. "Seems like it, huh?"

"Wow," Anthony said, "I don't know how to thank you for all this!"

MS laughed again. "You don't have to! It's a gift given by fate. I had no say in who got these powers. But I can definitely say that I'm glad you were the one who got them!"

Anthony smiled. She was glad, huh? Well, you can't complain about that, now can you? "Well, I suppose I'm done here." MS reopened the portal she had opened earlier and phased out of Princess Peach once again. But just as she was about to step through the portal, MS paused. "Oh! And one more thing," she said, turning to Anthony. She formed another blue ball of light in her hand and shaped it into an egg. The egg was dark blue with bright blue cracks in it. "If you ever need me, use this to summon me," MS said as she handed the egg to him. With a smile and a wave, MS stepped through the portal and disappeared. The portal disappeared a few seconds after she did, leaving a blue glow behind that slowly faded away.

Anthony looked at the egg. He smiled. This was going to be a lot of fun. Devious fun, but fun nonetheless. Just then, Peach came to life. Her eyes opened with a gasp. After looking around the room for a few seconds, she walked over to Anthony.

"Hi there, master. I am Princess Peach. How may I serve you?"

Anthony stood there for a few moments. Awkward silence formed an invisible wall between the fictional girl replica and the fifteen year old boy. Suddenly, Anthony burst out laughing! Tears of joy streaked down his face as he fell to the floor with laughter. Peach seemed puzzled by this suddenly fit of laughter, but decided that if Anthony was laughing, it was okay for her to laugh, too. The two laughed for quite a while, even though Peach had no idea why she was laughing. After the laughter, (Ha! That rhymed!) Anthony stood up.

"Alright!" He said with a fire in his eyes, "Time to get started!"
114111112.title: The Most Awesome Reply Ever

choices: Let's see what the inside of her house looks like... (Follow Emmess.)
Cool! New powers and stuff! (Follow Anthony.)
1141111121.content:
MS stepped out of the portal she had made from Earth. Her feet touched the cold Azulean streets. She shivered. This place was always cold. The whole Azulean Realm, it seemed, was blue with a permanent case of Frostbite. MS looked around. She had ended up right in front of the High Council's Chapel. She knew this was no coincidence. She was summoned here. Of course, she would've ended up here no matter where she went first; no one escapes the High Council's wrath. Well, no one except her, at least. MS laughed.

"Let me guess, the High Council wants to see me, huh? You really don't need to hide! I know you're there!" MS giggled. It was true. She had encountered them so many times before...she knew when the High Council wanted her in their Chapel. She also knew exactly who they would send to convey the message: The Swords. Sure enough, she was, in an instant, surrounded by at least thirty of them. The Swords are the highest rank of Azulean Enforcer. They are honorable warriors who keep the peace and protect this Realm. They only appeared when they were needed. But MS knew that last sentence was a lie. The Swords could be summoned by the High Council if need be. As unnecessary as it seemed, when The High Council wanted MS to appear before them, The Swords would likely be there to make sure she got there.

"Heh...took you guys long enough. Slow day?" MS asked tauntingly. In response, The Swords unsheathed their identical katanas in rapid succession, making a sharp, eerie sound. This was a warning. With these blades, The Swords could cut through the very soul of an individual, quite literally shattering their existence. Seriously, that is a painful way to die. Even their clothes were a warning! They were stained with the blood of countless enemies, not to mention that The Swords were one of the few groups of Azuleans that wear red, the color of Death. They wore white cloaks with red trim, white sandals with red straps, and white straw hats with red stitches sown in a subtle spiral pattern. Of course, they were Azuleans, so all of this white was turned to a bright blue because their skin diluted all colors aside from blue and red. This was true for all Azuleans. Also, each Sword has a unique symbol on the left side of their cloak to differentiate one from another.

MS shivered again. It was still cold.

"Okay, okay," she said, glancing at the bare blades, "I get it! Go to the High Council or perish! Got it." The Swords sheathed their katanas. MS and the group of thirty Swords then made their way into the Chapel. MS shook her head. She knew what was going on...and she was quite prepared for it.

The High Council resided in the highest room of the tallest tower of the Chapel. (Hehehe, guess what movie I just referenced!) That room in particular was appropriately named the High Council Hall. This was where they watched over the entire Azulean Realm. This was also the place where they judged the accused and did to them what the law required. They were the judge, jury, and in some cases, the executioner.

MS started up the long spiral staircase that lead to the High Council Hall, the Swords right behind her, in a single file line. When they did reach the Hall, the Swords bowed to The High Council, then vanished without a sound. MS looked to the High Council with a bored look on her face. Here we go again, she thought.

"Emmess, Master Charmer and Mother of the Seed of Fate, you have been brought here to answer for your violation of Azulean Law! Your interaction with the humans could mean the end of their world and ours. You have committed a great sin, and now you will suffer for it!" The High Council said in eerie unison. (Kind of like the Elder gods from Mortal Kombat 2011.) Emmess, or MS, if you haven't figured that out yet, merely laughed at them. "You dare mock us? What is the meaning of this?"

"Hahaha! You think I am a fool? I know the laws, and yes, I have broken them." she said with a smile.

"So you admit your crime?"

"Yes...but you can't do anything to me."

"How can this be? You are in direct violation of-"

"Yeah, yeah, skip it! Look, I hate to break this to you, but the world hasn't been destroyed by the humans just yet...I'd give them about three hundred years until they do that..."

"Even so, your meddling in human affairs is a risk to the sanctity and balance of Earth and our Realm."

"Yeah, I know. The law says that the interaction has to be intentional and mean the destruction of either our Realm or the Earth by means of granting Azulean power to an unworthy human. However, a power granted by Fate can be reversed if necessary. If the world or our Realm becomes ravaged by the human using the Azulean power, the Azulean responsible will be forced to undo the damage done and will be punished for their crime. If the violation is a result of an Azulean who is a master of Fate, like me, then the punishment is less severe due to the fact that they can undo what they have done on command WITHOUT damaging the fabric of reality or destroying any human lives. If it is a result of an Azulean who is NOT a master of Fate, the process of undoing the damage will cost them their existence. So, to paraphrase, you can't do ANYTHING to me...yet! First of all, the person that received the powers of the Seed of Fate I created is a young man who has a semi-pure heart and a vivid imagination. He will not think to destroy the world; he doesn't have the time. He has more important things to do, like enjoy his Summer vacation. And second, if he does manage to destroy Earth, I can undo it with a snap of my finger. Either way, I am practically unharmed."

The High Council shook their heads in unison. She was, in fact, correct. The only thing they could do was wait and see what happened. "Very well. The consequences of your actions will simply depend whether or not Earth survives this ordeal. You may assist the human who is in possession of your powers, but only if he summons you. You will NOT do anything that could, in any way, disrupt the balance between our world and theirs. Begone!" And with a wave of their hands, The High Council removed Emmess from their Hall, out of the Chapel, and put her on the street outside.

Emmess shivered. "Damn, it's cold! Now I remember why I like being on Earth so much: An Azulean can remain unclothed and still be warm!" she thought aloud. "I should go home and get under the covers! It's so damn cold!"

Well, what now? Should we follow Emmess home and see what she's up to, totally invading her privacy that she doesn't care about? Or, should we focus on our main character, toying with his new powers?
1141111121.title: The Accused and the Unamused

choices: Stick with the upstanding young man! (Follow Anthony.)
11411111212.content:
"Alright!" Anthony said with a fire in his eyes, "Let's get started!"

Peach smiled. "If I may ask...what are we getting started with, master?" She asked softly.

"Okay...first off, you don't have to call me master...just call me Anthony!"

"Alright then, Anthony."

"Now, concerning your other question, I was referring to what I'm going to use these powers for!"

"Oh? And what might that be?"

"To do what every boy does to become a man!" Peach tilted her head and gave him a puzzled look. "...have sex." Anthony finished.

"Oh!" Peach looked away shyly. "Are you going to...do it...with me?"

"Not just you, my dear! All the video game girls I know...and some of the guys that will be females when I summon them..."

"Oh my!"

"Yes...the only trouble is...if I get caught...well...the whole universe could collapse!"

"Oh no!" Peach gasped.

"Hahaha! Just kidding!" Anthony laughed. Peach sighed with relief. "Nonetheless, I can't afford to get caught...but maybe I can summon some people who can help me keep that from happening."

"Oh? Like who?"

"I don't quite know...I have to think. But before I do that...I need you to go back inside your egg."

"Yes, Anthony." And with that, the pink shards of egg around the room began to circle the Mushroom Princess. They came together to create a giant version of the egg Anthony had fished out of his bathroom toilet just minutes before. Once Peach was inside and the egg was sealed, it shrunk down to its original size, thus completing the process.

"Well...that was cool," Anthony mused. "Alright. At least now I know that I can hide the girls if I need to...and since I have complete control over them...I can probably tell them to do it faster than that," He thought aloud. "Now...what to do..." He paced around the room, thinking. He thought...and thought...and thought...and kept on thinking. He went through every option in his head...every advantage...every girl he would need to summon to make it work...everything. Finally, after all that thinking, he decided he was thirsty.

And so...he went and got a glass of water, drank it, then returned to his room to finalize his plan. Pulling out some blank paper and a mechanical pencil, he began to write out his plan...step by step. He also drew some of the concepts that would be essential to his plan and labeled them...and since he was a talented artist, that was not a difficult task. He sketched and drew and scrawled and scribbled until he had everything he needed.

Here's his plan:

Step 1: Summon Zelda and Shang Tsung.

Step 2: Use their power combined to create the Magic Shield as described in 2A.

Step 3: Summon Samus Aran.

Step 4: Use her advanced technology to create Magic Shield Alarm System as depicted in 4A.

Step 5: Use Samus' tech to soundproof my room and upgrade my computer. (Hey, that's what I would do!)

Step 6: Have Zelda and/or Shang Tsung make the soundproofing renovations invisible and undetectable by any means.

Step 7: Summon Nina Williams, Kitana, Jade, Sub-Zero, Raven (Tekken Tag 2), Cammy, Chun-Li, Ibuki...etc, to defend the area.

Step 8: Lose your virginity! Over and over and over...and over...again.


What is this 'Magic Shield'? How will he use it? Why am I asking you all of these questions? Tune in next time to find out! Or..., you know...just...read the next chapter...once it's finished, that is.

Anywho, we have two options when it comes to where this story goes next. Should we stick with Anthony and see what his plan comes to? Or should we go back to the The Realm of the Azuleans and see what Emmess is up to?


Choose your destiny...INTERACTIVE STORIES!!! (Name that reference!)
11411111212.title: The Shield, The Ladies, and The Plan

choices: You Can Go Your Own Way! (Take your own spin on it.)
114111112121.content:
Before we move on, let's see what Anthony's Magic Shield and Magic Shield Alarm System are all about by taking a peek at his notes...



2A: Magic Shield



Uses Light Magic (Zelda) and Dark Magic (Shang Tsung).

The Magic Shield consists of four overlapping geometric formations. The first is a sphere that covers the entire planet Earth within its diameter. This is the Green Sphere. It is not literally green, of course...it's actually invisible...as well as intangible. The four 3-D shapes that make up the Magic Shield are color coded in correspondence with the Magic Shield Alarm System (See 4A).

The Magic Shield Geometric Color Code, in order from biggest to smallest, is Green Sphere, Yellow Sphere, Orange Prism, Red Prism.

The Green Sphere covers Earth. (No duh...)

The Yellow Sphere covers my house with a 100 foot radius.

The Orange Prism envelopes the entire interior of my house, excluding the second floor.

The Red Prism takes care of the upstairs, excluding my room.



4A: Magic Shield Alarm System



The Magic Shield Alarm System is designed with Samus' advanced technology...magically connected to the Magic Shield via satellite uplink. Its purpose is to protect me and my operation from being discovered or harmed in any way. The color code used for the Magic Shield itself is used in correspondence with this alarm system (See 2A). The whole system is hidden inside my computer.

There are 4 threat levels to The Magic Shield Alarm System. There are 4 geometric pieces that make up The Magic Shield. Do the math, people. Now, the cool thing about the Magic Shield and the Magic Alarm System is that when a threat is identified,the magic Zelda and Shang Tsung used to make the Magic Shield freezes all time in the universe. While time is at a standstill, the tech Samus used to make the Magic Shield Alarm System analyzes the problem and lists possible solutions. When a solution is chosen and the problem is resolved, time unfreezes and the universe returns to normal.

Threat Level 1, or Code Green, concerns anything happening inside The Green Sphere and outside The Yellow Sphere. Threat Level 1 is activated only when serious world issues occur. This includes, but is not limited to, natural disasters, wars, terrorist attacks, meteors, and things of a similar nature.

Threat Level 2, or Code Yellow, concerns anything happening inside The Yellow Sphere and outside the Orange and Red Prisms. Threat Level 2 is activated when anyone or anything that isn't expected, or is expected to arrive at a certain time, gets too close to the house. For example, Threat Level 2 is raised when my mom steps into The Yellow Sphere, regardless of whether or not she gets home early, on time, or late. Special cases, like the occasional jogger and the squirrels that live in the Oak next to our house, generally do not sound Threat Level 2. The alarm system is designed to decide whether or not certain things are considered threats.

Threat Level 3, or Code Orange, concerns anything happening within The Orange Prism. Threat Level 3 is activated the moment anyone or anything enters the 1st floor of my house. This does not include anything like insects...unless its serious. Again, the Magic Shield Alarm System is designed to assess threats on its own.

Threat Level 4, or Code Red, concerns anything happening within The Red Prism. Threat Level 4 is raised whenever anything that could jeopardize the operation in any way happens in The Red Prism. This includes things like my parents leaving the bedroom to see what I'm doing...or coming upstairs to tell me dinners ready...etc.


Well...that was informative, was it not? What should we do now? Go ahead and continue my story? Or take your own spin on it? Your move!
114111112121.title: Anthony's Notes

1141111121211.content:
Once Anthony wrote his plan out, all that he needed to do was...do it! And he did. (Queue plan montage.)

Here's a quick recap:

He summoned Zelda and Shang Tsung from The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess and Mortal Kombat (2011). He then asked them to create the Magic Shield, a four level color coded system that could only be created by a combination of light and dark magic. In order to keep each level of the Shield monitored, and to truly ensure the safety of his operations, Anthony summoned Samus Aran from Metroid Prime 3: Corruption to create the Magic Shield Alarm System using her advanced technology.

The Magic Shield Alarm System connects to the four colored shield levels through a satellite uplink designed to interpret the magic used to create the Shield as code, and encrypt it. Like any good security system, the MSAS acts as a guardian, using a complex processor to identify threats it sees through the coding of the Shield. It literally sees everything and anything it needs to, and determines whether or not it is a threat. It also features a very powerful generator that uses Xenonic Fusion and magic to create a reaction more powerful than any nuclear power seen on Earth before, and uses it to stop time. When a plausible threat to the operation is identified, the MSAS will use this generator to stop all time in the universe, leaving Anthony or one of the more competent girls under his command to decide what must be done in response. Once a solution is chosen, time will move forward again.

To make sure that the security measures themselves do not jeopardize the operation, the Shield itself was rendered invisible, while the MSAS was formatted into Anthony's computer. This made it impossible for anyone other than Anthony or the girls to access either system. However, Anthony also had to make sure that, if he did conduct operations while the house was occupied, no one would hear them and come to investigate. For this reason, he also had Samus soundproof his entire room completely. Then, he had Zelda and Shang Tsung make these renovations completely undetectable. You'd never know they were there.

Once all of this was complete, all Anthony had left to do was to summon girls that could protect him and contribute to the operation, in addition to the the girls he had already summoned. (In other words, they would have to be a skilled fighter and/or be cute or sexy enough to have sex with on a regular basis.) However, Anthony also remembered MS saying something about not summoning too many girls at one time. Considering he could choke on an egg and die if he tries to summon too many, he made sure to heed this warning. He decided to set the limit at six girls a day. With Peach, Zelda, Shang Tsung, and Samus already summoned, Anthony had to choose 2 more girls to summon. He does, and that bit is in the next chapter.

So, everything went according to Anthony's plan. To see what happens when we ACTUALLY GET BACK INTO THE NARRATIVE!!!...keep going by clicking on the first option. If you want to branch off here or create more options, click the second option. Thanks.
1141111121211.title: According to Plan, Man!

choices: Who can it be now? (Anthony chooses a different girl.)
11411111212111.content:
Anthony looked at his watch. It was around 5:00. His mother would soon be returning from work. Luckily, he had already programmed his mom's schedule into the MSAS. Anthony mulled everything over in his mind for a few moments. Was there anything else he was forgetting? He still needed two more girls for today, but other than that, everything was ready. There was no way anything could go wrong. (Famous last words, am I right? Don't worry, though. He's all good.)

"Alrighty then..." Anthony sat down on the bed. He needed to think about this. What two girls could he summon that would not only be useful guardians, but well-endowed sex partners? Anthony looked around at who he had summoned so far. He had Peach, the royal blonde. She is a master cake baker...and who knows what kind of cheesecake she has hidden underneath that dress? (Hehe, I made a pun.) Next was Zelda, the princess of Hyrule. She has control over a limited yet powerful arsenal of magic powers, and a calm demeanor that seems to just come with being fictional royalty. How would she do in bed, I wonder? Then there's Shang Tsung, the backstabbing sorcerer of Outworld....

As MS stated back in chapter 9, if Anthony ever summoned a MALE character, a FEMALE version of the character would appear instead. Shang Tsung, as it turns out, is a male. So, we can conclude that the female rendition of Shang Tsung would be the one standing in Anthony's bedroom, not the male one. If you can't picture that, allow me to give you a detailed description!

Shang Tsung now stood as a woman five feet and three inches tall, with long jet black hair tied in a ponytail. Her eyes, thanks to Anthony, were empty and featureless, with no pupils to be seen. (This was simply added to make her look more badass.) She wore Shang Tsung's standard costume from Mortal Kombat 2011, a mostly back outfit featuring golden snake designs and red trim, with a divide down the center of the chest section, revealing the inside of her breasts ever so slightly. She had an emerald necklace around her neck and a matching belt formed of spiraling gold snakes around her waist, with tight black pants on her legs and black strapped shoes on her feet. She had a East-Asian skin tone, and her face was sharp and confident...very snake-like, if you will. She was very attractive for who she was...and Anthony was definitely not disappointed by the results of the gender-swap. Not in the least...

But now he needed two more. Anthony laid back on his sheets.

"Who do I need?" He thought aloud. "They should definitely be an expert at hand-to-hand combat..." he glanced at Shang Tsung. "And it needs to be someone who has a more...diverse set of combos and moves." His eyes wandered around the room, searching for an answer to this problem. Suddenly, he found it. Anthony had recently purchased Tekken Tag Tournament 2, the most recent of the Tekken series, and was a skilled player...on a normal level, at least. He leaped off of his bed and grabbed the case. "Samus!"

"Yes, Anthony?" she replied. (Yes, I know she normally doesn't talk, but she has to...for obvious reasons.)

"Could you pull up the Tekken Tag 2 roster for me, please? I need names, pictures, and fighting styles." Anthony said with excitement.

"Of course." she replied.

"Thank you." Anthony always tried to be polite with the girls. Though they were technically his slaves, he didn't have to treat them like slaves. The term seemed a bit too derogatory. However, it was nice to know that they would do anything he asked them to. Samus did as she was asked, and a list of all the characters from Tekken Tag 2 appeared in front of him.

Anthony looked at the list for some time. After a while, he narrowed it down to 4 possibilities: Nina Williams, Anna Williams, Asuka Kazama, and Christie Monteiro. Let's split them up by Appearance, Personality, Fighting Style, and Pros and Cons. Or, APFSPC.

Nina Williams.

Appearance:

Standing at five feet and three inches tall, this Irish-born bombshell blonde doesn't look like your average assassin. She has clear crystal blue eyes, and usually has a serious look on her beautiful face. She usually keeps her hair in a long ponytail and is almost always seen wearing lipstick that matches whatever outfit she may be wearing. (Nowadays, she wears peach-colored lipstick most of the time.) Nina has a few different outfits, but the one she's been seen wearing in the more recent games is her trademark catsuit, a lightweight and flexible one-piece suit that covers her body in purple camouflage. It does leave some skin exposed for anyone who's dumb enough to stare at her too long, and is, in itself, very sexy. Complete with high-heels and a knife strapped to her right thigh, Nina is quite literally dressed to kill. She has beautiful ivory skin that accents her hourglass figure. Nina is definitely well endowed in both the chest and the posterior, making for a sleek, sexy, stylish, and serious assassin. She's 45, but Nina was cryogenically frozen, so physically, she looks 25...and technically, she IS 25. Keep that in mind.

Personality:

Nina is...kind of a bitch...but, in a good way, I suppose. She has a very cold and serious demeanor, not usually showing emotion...unless, of course, she's hurting people. Her sadistic side combined with her hatred for her sister, Anna, resulted in a wide range of taunts, from tossing her hair back and walking away, to showing her figure off to her opponents before she knocks them out, to laughing at them mercilessly. Nina also has quite a few awesome one-liners, like, "I don't play with amateurs," and, "Isn't it past your bedtime?"

She gets a kick out of pissing off her sister, who is also kind of a bitch, and they have been trying to kill each other for a while now. (It all started during or just before Tekken 5.) She also is very indifferent towards men. The reason behind this indifference is that she was impregnated without her knowing about it, giving birth to a Steve Fox, who is another fighter in the Tekken series. (She never knew that she even had a son, thanks to being frozen.) Nina is an assassin for hire, but she has done the world a lot of good. The only stain on her record was helping Jin start World War III in Tekken 6. (I hated Tekken 6, by the way.) Up until then, she pretty much played by her own rules.

Hidden under that cold-hearted and cruel personality is probably a sweet Irish maiden...but most people wouldn't live long enough to find that out for themselves. Proceed with caution! If you want her, you'll have to kick her ass. And, in all honesty, she probably won't like you even if you do, seeing as she hates losing. (She especially hates losing to Anna. The two rival sisters do occasionally team up or agree to a truce, but these truces are always temporary, ending when one stabs the other in the back.)

Fighting Style:

The 'official' Tekken wiki says that Nina uses a combination of Koppo-jutsu and Aikido. I actually have no idea what those are. (You can look them up for yourself if you're really curious.) But I do know Nina also has some skill in the assassination arts. Based on what I know of her from Tekken 5 and Tekken Tag 2, she uses a lot of change-up combos with her legs and has a unique set of chain grabs and takedowns that will leave her enemies with broken arms, legs, and necks. Her signature combo is one of mine and Anthony's personal favorites, appropriately named The Double Bitch Slap. This was followed by The Triple Bitch Slap in Tekken Tag 2. In the former, Nina uses her front-facing hand to deliver as sinister front slap to the face, which is followed by a backhand slap with the same hand. In the Triple variation, she starts with the backhand and ends with another backhand. Both moves send the unfortunate victim flying through the air, humiliated and in pain. Since her move set is very complex, you need patience and skill to use her effectively. And once she gets on a roll, there are very few things you can do to stop her.

Pros:

Anthony especially liked Nina in Tekken 5, and she was one of his best characters, next to Law, Lei, Paul, and Feng. He especially loves her catsuit, as purple is his second favorite color. Nina is a well endowed and very beautiful woman, a perfect sex partner, and she is also a very skilled-hand to-hand fighter. Thus, she is perfect for Anthony's needs. Since she has been seen using various firearms both in-game and in a great many cutscenes, Nina is also a skilled markswoman. That combined with her other skills and her knife makes her useful for any situation.

Cons:

She's already had a son. (But hey, he doesn't actually exist, so, technically, she's still a virgin! Whether or not she is a virgin doesn't really matter much to Anthony anyway.) As Anthony discovered in Tekken 5 and rediscovered in Tekken Tag 2, Nina cannot protect her long legs very well in-game. For this reason, she constantly gets outmaneuvered by some of the faster characters who hit low. This isn't a lethal weakness, but it does get kind of annoying sometimes. Nina and Anthony had a falling out in Tekken Tag 2, as Lei and Law proved to be more effective against some of Anthony's more skilled opponents. Nina, according to Anthony, had lost her effectiveness after Tekken 5. However, he does admit that this was purely because of his lack of practice with her. You can't forget that she is indifferent towards men, either. Anthony, however, doesn't mind that. He can slowly win her favor...or, he can try.

Now, you may have happened to glance down at the rest of this story. Looking at it, you may notice that the other three characters Anthony was deciding between are not listed with their APFSPCs below. That is because Anthony eventually decides on Nina. To see why, choose the first option. To choose someone else, pick the second option.
11411111212111.title: Decisions

choices: Run and Hide! (Hide the girls away and shut down the operation till tomorrow.)
No. I Will Not Give In! (Keep going.)
114111112121111.content:
Anthony thought about his decision for a long time. He smiled. Nina's the one, he thought. There were many reasons...but...here's a quick summary:

Anthony has never played Anna and doesn't know much about her. He only knows that Anna is a rival to Nina and is a little more flirtatious. She may be sexy, and Anthony will definitely summon her later, but right now, she doesn't have a lot to offer him.

Asuka is a character that Anthony never fully mastered, and she's a little too...young for Anthony's taste as of right now. She'll probably be summoned, too. She does have a nice rack, but breasts aren't everything.

And Christie...well...she's related to Eddie, who has one of the most awesome and devastating move sets in the history of Tekken! Anthony loves her outfit, and the way she isn't afraid to show you what she's got, but he never managed to master her, either. He'll get around to it, but until he does, she'll just be another pretty capoeira fighter.

Anthony made a fist and got an anime-like gleam in his eye. "Alright!" he exclaimed "I've made a decision!" All of the girls clapped politely. He looked down at the floor. Gosh, he thought, my throat feels a little dry. He pushed the notion aside. He probably should have expected that. Before long, Anthony was holding an egg that looked like Nina's purple catsuit from Tekken 5. He put it on the carpet and stood back. Everyone watched as the egg started to vibrate, standing up perfectly straight all the while. Cracks started to form, and before long, the egg shattered, sending bright gold and purple sparks in every direction. The egg opened up, and Nina Williams appeared before them in her signature fighting pose. Her eyes searched the room for only a moment, then her attention turned to Anthony.

"Hello there..." she said with an ominous undertone. Anthony gulped.

"Hello..." Anthony shook his head. He regained his composure, and walked toward Nina, who stood with her hands on her hips. He reached out his arm. "It's a pleasure to meet you in person, Nina Williams. Think of me not as you 'master,' but as your employer," he said politely.

He was calm...too calm it seemed. Nina hesitated. This teenage boy sounded a lot like her...somehow. Though his voice was different, his tone was sharp and precise. Nina made up her mind. She shook his hand.

"I suppose it is your pleasure," she replied coldly.

"I would expect nothing less than that," Anthony replied. Once again, Nina recoiled. Then she realized: it wasn't him...it was her! Nina smiled and turned her body away from Anthony. She walked away slowly, joining her predecessors on the other side of the room. Everyone looked at each other as an awkward silence flooded through the room. "You can do as you wish," Anthony said. Instantly, all of the girls began talking to each other. Anthony smiled. Some things never change. (Haha! Minor sexism there...if anyone bothered to catch that...I'm so lonely.)

Anthony had gotten a lot from Nina, including her calm demeanor and smooth speech. He thought it approriate to test it out on Nina herself...and it worked! How cool was that? But now, the real question became apparent to him as he sat down on his bed.

"Now then...who should the last girl I summon for today be?" Anthony thought aloud. He glanced up at the girls. Peach, Zelda, Shang Tsung, Samus, and now Nina...he sensed that all of these girls had one thing in common...that's it! They were all from fighting games of some sort! Well then, best continue the trend!

"I suppose...given the circumstances," he glanced at the girls, "I should choose another fighter...but from what game?" Anthony paced around the room, thinking about it. He paced and pondered for a few minutes. After a while, he sighed and sat back down on the bed. "I give up." He looked to the girls. "Do any of you ladies have any ideas?" Samus looked down and to her left. On Anthony's desk lay a copy of Soul Calibur V. She quickly grabbed it.

"Here, sir," Samus held up the case. "This could very well be what you're looking for."

"Hm? Aha!" Anthony jumped off the bed excitedly. He ran to his desk and swiped the case out of Samus' hands. "This," he said, holding up the PS3 game, "is indeed the answer! Thank you, Samus!"

"No problem."

"Samus? Would you mind pulling up the Soul Calibur V roster, like you did before?"

"Yes, of course." Before long, the Tekken Tag 2 Roster was soon replaced with the Soul Calibur V roster. Anthony stared at the list. Anthony's mental gears started turning:

Hm...how about Ivy? Nah, too obvious. Um...Tira? Maybe later. Cervantes? Hm...as much as I love his gun sword, I can't quite picture him as a girl. Natsu...nah, I don't play as her. Leixia? Haven't mastered her yet. Hilde? Nah, she sucks. Would any of the male characters work? Not right now, I don't think...Pyrrha? Naw, she's too...Pyrrha. Pyrrha Omega? No way! She's still too mopey. Elysium?

Anthony paused. Who is Elysium? Anthony thought really hard. Oh! The angel chick...right? Oh. That's right. She's another random character. But...there was something special about her. Anthony just couldn't put his finger on it. Oh! That's right! She only plays the female characters! How could he forget that? And, from what he understood, Elysium could take the face and form of anyone, being the spirit of Soul Calibur itself! That could be useful. She could be anyone he wanted her to! That would be...

"Perfect." Anthony said aloud. "I've made my decision!" Once again, all of the girls clapped politely. Anthony coughed. Wow. His throat was hurting a bit. This was definitely the last one for today. After a few moments, Anthony had a white egg with a small blue jewel on the front in his hand. There were feathers arranged into a wing formation on either side of the egg, as well. Soon, the egg cracked and shattered, as it always does. But, instead of sparks, a blinding light filled the room. Anthony shielded his eyes. Out of the light stepped Elysium, graceful as a swan. Her toes touched the carpet on Anthony's floor, and she walked forward ever so slowly. She silently approached Anthony, while Anthony silently waited for her. At last, the two were face to face. Elysium removed her mask. Anthony smiled. "So it is you."

"Yes, Elysium replied softly, "I am here."

Just then, the Magic Shield Alarm began to sound. Not really, though; it wasn't like an air raid alarm or anything. All it was was a female A.I. saying the threat level. Right now, it was saying, "Alert, threat level 2, code yellow, activated." Anthony immediately rushed to his computer. The screen read, 'THREAT LEVEL 2: CODE YELLOW.' All at once, all time in the entire universe froze, leaving Anthony and the girls untouched. Anthony smiled and jumped in the air.

(Author's note: by the way, in case you're wondering, Anthony decided to let Samus make some changes to the MSAS to make it better overall. One of those changes was a voice recognition system, monitored by an A.I. Samus created named Elsa by Anthony. He wanted to make ELSA an acronym, but he didn't have time. I'll give you more info on Elsa later on.)

"Awesome!" Anthony exclaimed, "It works! Of course, I knew it would..." Anthony scratched his head nervously. "Now then, let's see what this threat is. Elsa?"

"Threat identified," Elsa said. Suddenly, Anthony's rather small computer began to take itself apart and reassemble into an array of screens and keyboards all at once. (Just picture Anthony's computer being a transformer in the new movies. That's kinda what it looked like.) This was the MSAS's true form: a five way monitoring system with a multi-purpose multi-user setup. There were five screens and five keyboards, the biggest one being in front. The main screen displayed an image of a blue Ford Fusion crossing into the Yellow Sphere.

"It's your mother, Anthony," Elsa said.

"I see," Anthony scratched his head. "What can we do?"

"Well...there's really only two things you CAN do," Elsa replied. "You can either pack up the girls and shut down your operation for today...or you can keep time frozen and...do...whatever it is you want to do while time is still at a standstill."

"Hm..." Now Anthony had to make up his mind. He could get his priorities lined up, find a place to store the girls and start up again the next day...or try and...do...something with them. What will he do? The choice is yours! Well, since I'm going to add onto this later...you really only have one choice...the choice I don't use. Sorry about that.
114111112121111.title: No Hell-Raisers Here! (Threat Identified)

choices: Anthony's Family (Learn more about Anthony and his family. Go figure.)
Do something else... (Like visit Emmess...she's lonely.)
1141111121211111.content:
"Hmm..." Anthony paused for a moment to think. He looked at all of the girls. Given he hadn't truly figured out his next move after summoning Elysium, his next best move would probably be to figure out where to store the girls he had, and work from there. Besides, he still had no idea what he was doing when it came to sex, since none of these girls had had it...not even Nina! (Because, if they did, it was non-canon. There might be something I missed, but...just roll with it.) That settled it, then. He had to shut down the operation for now, and find a way to hide the girls where they couldn't possibly be discovered.

"Alright. Elsa, I've made up my mind. We need to figure out where to hide the girls. Any suggestions?" (Oh, just so you know, Elsa isn't invisible...she has a human form...it's just digital. She can usually be see as a 3-D representation when she's not doing something that takes up all five screens. She's a redhead with blue eyes and glasses that's...naked, but she's covered in code. Anthony will give her something to wear later. For now, she looks fine the way she is.)

"Sure...you can use my Dimensional Storage Unit. Samus made it for the sole purpose of storing any physical object inside my system as coding. You could make the girls turn into egg form, have me scan them, and store them inside of me. No one but you would be able to access them, and it would be impossible to get to them without activating me, and only you can do that."

"I see...anything to add, Samus?"

"Nope," Samus replied, "She's got it."

"Alright then, sounds like a plan!" Anthony smiled. This was working out beautifully! Every part of the plan falling into place, and every new obstacle being dodged! This was truly a great day! But, there was no time to celebrate just yet. He still had to get his girls into the DSU and get ready for his mom's arrival. Wait a minute...

Anthony paused for a moment. Why was mom getting back so late? It was like 5:30, right? He looked at the clock on his nightstand. The digital numbers said it was 6:01. Anthony fell over anime-style. 6:01?! How was that even possible? What could possibly-? Then he realized. Mom had to pick up his sister Mia from water polo practice. That made perfect sense. Well, didn't account for that. Oh, well. Ain't gettin' any better! Back to business.

Anthony gained his composure. "Alright. Girls, if you be so kind as to go into your egg forms..." The girls did so. Soon, six small eggs were sitting on the floor. "Elsa! Initiate DSU scanning and storing for all the girls, if you would."

"Yes, sir. Beginning DSU scanning." Suddenly, from all sides of the room, blue lasers gridlocks began to sift through the room. Within a matter of minutes, Elsa had scanned all the eggs. "Initiate DSU transfer?"

"Yes."

"Beginning DSU transfer. Hold onto your hats!" Elsa's eyes glowed bright blue as the transfer began. Anthony's computer terminal, which had remained dormant up until now, suddenly began to disassemble and reassemble into something resembling the bag scanners you see at airports. Robotic hands, feminine ones, proceeded to reach out of the terminal and grab the eggs one by one and place them on the transfer machine...thingie. As the eggs were pulled into the machine by its conveyor belt, they began to disappear one by one. Every time they did, bright flashes of blue light filled the room, almost blinding Anthony.

"Man," Anthony thought aloud, "I've gotta make it so that these things don't blind me every time I have to use them."

"Acknowledged." Anthony jumped. He forgot Elsa could multitask. Soon, the process was complete. All of the girls were safely stored within the DSU inside Elsa's mainframe. "Transfer complete."

"Yippee!" Anthony said happily. "Go ahead and lower the threat level, Elsa! Priority threat, code yellow, level 2, has been acknowledged and will be dealt with accordingly. Disengage Time Stop and engage discretion protocols." And thus, time began to move forward once more. Elsa did as she was told and folded herself back into Anthony's computer. (Just so you know, since Elsa technically IS the MSAS, I'll just refer to the MSAS as Elsa or, her, from now on. I'm getting tired of all of these acronyms!) Anthony quickly turned on his PS3 and proceeded to play the nearest game, which was Soul Calibur V. He fought and fought for about fifteen minutes or so before he heard the garage door open and close. Then, after a little while, he heard the door to the garage open. Sounded like mom and Mia were still talking about something. Guess he should go down and greet them.

He got up and made his way downstairs. When he got there, he turned and tried to walk around the corner. But, when he did, he ran right into his twin, and since they were about the same height, their heads bashed into each other as a result!

"Ow!" They cried simultaneously. They mumbled and grumbled and rubbed their foreheads to make the pain go away. Their mother laughed.

"You two have the funniest habit of running into each other. Head first, I might add!" She giggled. Anthony and Mia looked to the ceiling, recalling all of their 'head-smash incidents.'

Their first one was at birth. Anthony had popped out first, and since Mia was right behind him, she landed on top of him in the doctor's arms, and they bashed into each other, head first, for the first time. Luckily, neither one of them was brain-damaged. There were several other incidents to account for in the past...in a variety of locations: the ballpark near their house, the aquarium, the zoo...even at school...especially at school! In fact, that was where they bashed into each other the most! (The two siblings don't know it, but they've run into each other head first at school 36 times in total!) The point is, they run into each other a lot. Head first.

"Eh, sorry about that, sis," Anthony said, still rubbing his head.

"No problem, bro," Mia replied, smiling nervously. The two stood there at the bottom of the stairs for quite a while, rubbing their heads. Diana, their mother, put some things away before making her way past them and into the kitchen. Diana Davidson. Nice ring to it, huh? Oh? You want to know more about her? Mia too? Well, I'll go ahead and-

"Wait...isn't Mia's character description at the beginning of the story?" Anthony asked the author.

Wha...wha? Anthony can break the 4th wall!? WHAT THE HELL!?"

"Sure I can! Having the powers of any video game character automatically gives me the ability to break the 4th wall at will!"

Oh...quess I didn't think about that, huh?

"No, no you didn't."

Well, regardless, you might want to learn more about Mia anyway, right?

"Sure, sure."

And what about your father?

Anthony stood there, shocked. Then, after only a few moments, he fell down anime-style.

As I thought. Since I haven't created him, you don't even know who he is!

"You heartless bastard!"

Hehehe. I can be as cheeky as I want at this point. Besides, it was you who wanted to break the 4th wall, not me!

"He...he's right..."

Well then, guess I win. Now, you can either learn more about Anthony's family, or...do something else. Like visit Emmess!

"Still so cold!" Emmess exclaimed from her room.

"Wait, what the hell? When did she get here!?" Anthony asked in anime-style confusion and rage.

I guess, since she hasn't been here for like 4 chapters...

"Five!" Emmess exclaimed.

...5...chapters...I guess all this 4th wall breaking made a hole big enough for her to make a cameo!

"Okay, now I'm just confused..." Anthony proceeded to faint...anime-style. (You'll be seeing this adjective a lot. And, I made it up! So, ha!)

"I'll...just go back to sleep..." Emmess said with a yawn.

Well...now that everyone who could possibly be a problem is unconscious, it's time to continue the story!

As I said before, you can either learn more about Anthony's family...or do something else. Completely up to you. But, technically this isn't true...seeing as I'm going to tell you about Anthony's family. You can either read on or go your own way, I guess. (Also, in case you haven't figured out by now, I, the author, am now officially a character in this story! Thank you 4th wall breaking powers!)
1141111121211111.title: Deception and Discretion (Or so you'd think...)

11411111212111111.content:
Diana Davidson:

Anthony's mother, a spritely woman in her mid-forties. Despite her age, her complexion is that of an angel, with hair smooth as silk and skin like satin. She has curly red-brown hair, ivory skin, and bright blue eyes. She often wears white, which leads Mr. Davidson to call her Angel a lot. When not wearing her vast assortment of white outfits, Diana can be seen wearing white blue-spotted pajamas and white bunny slippers. She enjoys a nice cup of chi tea every morning and works at an accounting office in town. She drives the family car, a blue Ford Fusion, more than her husband does. She usually leaves for work around 6:45 in the morning and comes back around 5:30 in the afternoon. If she needs to grab Mia from water polo practice, it's a good thirty minutes more. As Anthony and Mia's mom, she loves them both very much and is usually quite gentle with them. She's always willing to help them with homework and gives them good advice when it comes to life in general. Still, if you can manage to piss her off, she's a second degree black belt in judo. If you threaten her or her family, she'll put you six feet under with her bare hands. Though, you'll rarely see that side of her. All in all, Diana is a sweet and loving individual. She almost always has a smile on her face.

Richard Davidson:

Anthony's father, a man in his late forties. Richard, often called Richie by his friends at work, has lived alongside his wife Diana for almost 16 years. He had two children with her. Twin children. That would be Anthony and Mia. He loves them both very much. So much so, that he's willing to fly across the country for his high-paying job as a corporate executive. He holds the title of Vice President in a very successful company, and with that title comes many responsibilities. Even so, he's not gone all the time. He'll always find time for his twins. And his wife, who he loves with a fiery passion. In fact, he loves her so much, that sometimes he can be a little too romantic when it comes to his Angel. He's a well built individual, able to do some serious heavy lifting. He's also very flexible for someone his age. He has dark brown hair and dark green eyes, with slightly tan skin. and a winning smile. He also sports a very manly mustache and goatee. He often wears a gray pinstripe suit with an olive green shirt and a black tie. When he's not on the job, you'll usually see him in jeans and some kind of shirt, though not always. He can often be seen without one. Though, he usually only goes shirtless when he's in the house. He's a manly man, a ladies man, a family man, and a sharp-dressed man. Who could ask for more?

Mia Davidson:

Anthony's sister, a young girl at the age of 15 and-a-half. She's Anthony's twin, matching him in height, hair color, and disposition. But, as every human being differs in some way, Mia and Anthony do share some differences. For one, Mia can't bring herself to read books. She can't stand sitting still long enough to enjoy books. That's why she loves anime so much. Anthony, on the other hand, has a huge collection of manga in his bookcase. Mia also likes sports, an outlet Anthony wouldn't touch with a ten-foot pole. She also sports a different eye color than her brother. Instead of dark brown, Mia's eyes are blue, like her mother's. She loves video games, too. She can often be seen playing Fire Emblem and Final Fantasy. When she's not playing those, she plays fighting games like Tekken and Street Fighter. Fire Emblem is without a doubt her favorite game series, though. Her favorite character in Fire Emblem is Mia. She finds it funny that Mia in the game is very similar to her in real life. She often cosplays as Mia because they share the same name. She's tougher than your average teenager, but at the same time, she's sweet and kind. She may have a fiery personality, but that's just her way of being different. Mia is basically a cross between a tomboy and a girly-girl, willing to stand up and stand out. She doesn't like to wear make-up, and despises complete girly-girls with a passion. She has a love for water, and joined the water polo team at her high school because of it. She's a good friend and a smart young woman. Just...don't give her too much sugar. If Mia gets her hands on too much sugar, she gets very hyper. She's already extremely fast, able to outrun her brother without too much effort. She's cool, kind, and loves video games and anime almost as much as she loves her brother. A good sister if there ever was one.

(Just a side note here...since birth, both Anthony and Mia have had the strangest habit of crashing into each other head-first. It's not something that happens every day, but every once in a while, for no reason whatsoever, the two siblings will just walk right into each other. This odd phenomenon occurs most often at school. It's also quite hilarious.)
11411111212111111.title: Family Matters

114111112121111111.content:
Anthony got up and followed his mother into the kitchen. Mia busied herself with putting her water polo gear away, then walked upstairs to get changed. Mrs. Davidson gave her son a pleasant smile.

"So, how was your last day of school, Anthony?"

"Oh, it was fine. Great! Awesome! It was the last day of school, what else can I say?" Anthony grinned as he leaned against the kitchen counter. Mrs. Davidson laughed.

"I see. Well, Mia had a great time at practice today. And I had a lovely day at work, too."

"Well, your job isn't exactly stressful, mom. You work at a beauty spa."

"Hm. You do have a point there, son."

"Speaking of jobs, when's dad coming back?"

"July 1st," Mia interrupted. Anthony turned to look at her. Mia was wearing a black T-shirt with a picture of Sonic the Hedgehog on the front, accompanied by white short shorts with a braided leather belt. Her hair was still wet from practice, but the rest of her was mostly dry.

"Nice shirt," Anthony said, raising an eyebrow. "Kinda looks my shirt."

"Yeah, yeah, I know. It was in your hamper, so I took it."

"To what end?" Anthony asked, curious.

"Well, I didn't want to get any of my clothes for the week wet. So, since I did my laundry yesterday, I figured I could steal a shirt from your hamper and wear my shorts from yesterday."

"Why didn't you just wear your other shirt?"

"'Cause it's...kinda small, you know?"

Mrs. Davidson smiled. "Perfectly understandable, dear. Just make sure you ask next time."

"Got it." With a salute, Mia ran upstairs, shouting behind her, "call me when dinner's ready!"

Anthony turned to his mom. "What is for dinner tonight, anyway?"

"Hm...tortellini with white cheddar sauce, garlic bread, tomato tapenade on some Italian bread slices, and a light salad. Sound good?"

Anthony was no stranger to his mom's cooking. It was spectacular. Guess she was in the mood for Italian tonight. No doubt she would chase this meal down with some white wine. "Sounds great. Thanks, mom." Anthony started to make his way upstairs.

"I'll call you when it's ready. You don't have any summer homework, do you?"

Anthony looked back at her from the bottom of the stairs. "Yeah. But I'm not going to do it today. Why would I? I just got out of school!"

Mrs. Davidson laughed heartily. "Alright, I get it. Go have fun."

Anthony smiled as he went upstairs. I'll have fun, alright. Just not the kind you'd expect! He quickly slid into his room and shut the door. He glanced around the room. It looked untouched. Good thing he had put his hamper in the laundry room that morning.

"Alright, Elsa. Come on out." A small, button-sized hologram projector appeared on Anthony's computer terminal, and Elsa appeared, sitting in his desk chair. Elsa looked like a girl in her twenties, with bright red hair, sky blue eyes and dark blue skin. The only reason she was blue was because that was the color preset of the hologram projector. Like MS, she was strikingly naked. What wasn't already visible was covered with small blue blocks that represented her unfinished coding. The blocks were constantly shifting, like the plastic balls in a bingo wheel. She stood up and gave Anthony a small salute.

"What can I do for you, sir?"

"Get the girls out, if you would. We need to do some upgrades..."

"Upgrades?"

"Yeah. I realized something while I was downstairs." Elsa quickly disappeared into the terminal, and got to work getting the girls out of it. She activated her Digital Structuring Module, a device created using Samus' teleportation equipment. It basically took the girls, converted them into code, sent them through a wormhole generator, then reconstructed them in Anthony's room. Soon, all six of them were in Anthony's room.

"Alright, ladies. Here's the deal," he said as he walked over to his desk chair. He spun it around and sat in it, and motioned for the other girls to sit down, too. "We need to think about what we're doing." Some of the girls exchanged quizzical looks. "First off, we need to ensure that we don't get...what's the word? Desensitized...to all of this. We don't want to lose our...drive, you know? We don't want to stop having fun with this. I want this to be enjoyable...forever. I'm sure you all know by now what I intend to do with you all. We will have sex several times. My hope is that we don't lose out to repetition. That it always feels like the first time. That it feels even better the next time!"

Samus nodded. She knew where this was going. Shang Tsung had the same premonition, a devious smile snaking it's way across her face.

"I'm also concerned for our safety. We don't want to lose out to STDs, either. And I assume none of you want to get impregnated by a teenager. I don't want to be a dad. Well, not yet, at least." At this, the girls laughed. And it wasn't because Anthony forced them to laugh, either. It was a legitimate notion. Anthony laughed, too. "Alright, alright. Anyway, to avoid all of these problems, I'm going to have Elsa give us some enhancements using Samus' medical technology. This may also require a little magic. I'm sure some of you saw this coming." Samus and Shang Tsung nodded.

Elsa appeared next to Anthony. "What do you have in mind?" Anthony quickly told her all he wanted to accomplish and how. Slightly stunned by how fast he relayed his plan to her, Elsa disappeared. Seconds later, she reappeared sitting on Anthony's desk. "Everything's getting set up. Estimated time of completion, 45 minutes, 26.7 seconds."

Anthony nodded. "That leads me to my next point. Ladies, as I said before, I'm not your master. I'm no slave driver. You all are intelligent, and you all have free will. Still, that doesn't mean you can just go up and betray me, but I'm not going to make you do everything that I say. You can challenge me. You can do what you like! Of course, since I know what you know...and have your abilities, I don't think you'll even need to challenge me. I keep all of you in mind every time I make a decision that concerns our operations. All of you. You are all awesome and special. You wouldn't be here if you weren't. That said, I think sex slave is a poor occupation for all of you. We'll have sex, alright. But there's more to life than just sex. I know that. Some people don't, but I do. That's why, while we wait for Elsa to set up what we need, we're going to do some other stuff! Like, for instance, play video games!"

At that, the girls became very happy. Nina and some of the other, more serious, girls in the group just smiled and nodded. Peach, on the other hand, jumped for joy. The girls had lots of fun with Anthony. He made sure that there were plenty of different consoles and screens open to them. Anthony even suggested that they have a Super Smash Bros. Brawl tournament. Peach, Samus, and Zelda agreed to join. Shang Tsung managed to convince Nina to play Mortal Kombat with her. Elysium decided to play Soul Calibur with Elsa. They played Soul Caliber IV, Elsa choosing to be Kilik while Elysium played as herself. It was a very fun 45 minutes and 26.7 seconds.

Anthony managed to win two of the Brawl tournaments as Zelda, while Samus and Zelda both secured a win as themselves. Once Peach decided to stop playing as herself, she managed to snatch a win, too. The three fictional replicas had a 5-stock, no-items match to settle the tie-breaker. Peach played as Mario, Zelda played as Toon Link, and Samus played as Fox. In the end, Samus was victorious. Meanwhile, Nina managed to learn the ins and outs of Mortal Kombat. She played as Sonya Blade, while Shang Tsung played as herself. Thanks to Elsa, she was able to play as her female self in-game. Elsa just made a 3-D model of her and modded it into the game as an extra costume for Shang Tsung. Elysium and Elsa really went at it in Soul Calibur IV. They ended up tying, but Elsa swore she would break the tie someday.

Eventually, they ran out of time. Anthony told Elsa to put the games away, and sat the girls down again. He then proceeded to explain what he was going to do to them. In short, they would each receive a shot that contained a great number of nano-bots. These nano-bots were designed to make sure they never became desensitized to sexual pleasure, and would also attack and destroy any STD present in their bodies. The nano-bots could be set to make sexual pleasure last longer, or be more pleasurable. It could even make sure the sex itself lasted longer than the average one-and-done. Anthony would receive the same shot.

"These nano-bots will save us a lot of trouble," Anthony finished. "Anyone have any questions?" No one did. "In that case, Elsa, my dear, could you please administer the shots?"

"You got it. Seven nano-bot shots comin' right up!" To make a long paragraph short, Elsa administered the shots.

"Alright. Now for the main event!" Anthony looked at his watch. It was about 7:21. Mom would call for dinner any second. Just then, Mrs. Davidson's voice rang out from downstairs.

"Dinner's ready!"

"Damn it," Anthony said, snapping his fingers. "Just when I got everything ready. Oh, well. Elsa, get the girls back into the terminal, if you would. I'll be back soon enough." As Elsa began to transport the girls back into the terminal, Anthony left his room and made his way downstairs. He was only seconds behind his sister. The Davidsons all enjoyed a nice meal together. Afterwards, Anthony managed to get back to his room. He had Elsa take the girls back out of the terminal, and he sat them all down once more.

"Now," he said, beaming, "I get to decide who goes first!"
114111112121111111.title: Upgrades

choices: Feeling Peachy Keen (Stay with Anthony and Peach.)
Take a Byte (See what Elsa and the other Replicas are up to.)
1141111121211111111.content:
The girl exchanged glances of varying emotion, then turned their attention back to Anthony, who was sitting in his desk chair. Nina was leaning against the far wall, with Shang Tsung standing behind her. Samus was on Nina's right, closest to the computer. Elsa was standing next to Samus. Peach sat on the edge of Anthony's bed, knees up over the wooden railing. Zelda stood at her right, and Elysium sat in a chair next to her.

"Seeing as it's the end of the first day of summer, I think we deserve to celebrate. We accomplished a lot today." The girls nodded in agreement. "We established a base of operation. We devised a way to protect our operation. We created an A.I. to run the operation. We even thought of a way to protect ourselves from the occupational hazards of the operation." Anthony smiled and shrugged as he looked around at all of the girls. "It seems to me like the only thing we haven't done yet is actually commence the operation itself!"

At that remark, everyone laughed. He was right, after all. All of Anthony's time that day had been invested in prep work.

"So...who does go first?" Nina asked. The room went silent.

"Well. I thought about it. And I think Peach should go first. I did summon her first."

"That makes sense," Samus said.

"I assume you'll...do us...by order of summoning?" Zelda asked hesitantly.

"Exactly. I'll do everyone I summon at least once. And I promise you, if I don't do you over and over again, it doesn't mean that I hate you. The only reason I won't do all of you over and over agin is because I'll be summoning new girls every week. Maybe every day. I can't do you all. I mean, I could, but you guys can have fun on your own. Elsa made you some pretty sweet accommodations, yeah?"

The girls couldn't say no. Elsa's terminal had a place for each one of them. She even designed them according to their specifications. These homes, or Bytes, can be connected by data streams, which will allow any one girl to visit another in their Byte. In short, the accommodations were beyond spectacular. None of the girls would be bored in Anthony's absence.

"That said, I might still call you back on a whim. Maybe for something specific. I'll try and be spontaneous now and then, but for right now, it's chronological order. That means you go first, Peach."

"Yay!" Peach hopped off of the bed excitedly.

"The rest of you can go back into the terminal and watch, if you like. You don't have to, though. Just a suggestion. But I'd like at least a few people to watch. Way better than anything you'll find on TV, you know what I'm sayin'?" Anthony grinned and raised one eyebrow.

choices: Do Something You Wanted to Do
115112.content:
For some reason, Krystal from the Star Fox series pops into your head, bit it's only for a moment. Then you get the oddest feeling, like one of the seeds you swallowed somehow got stuck in your throat. You try coughing, and drinking a few glasses of water, but the feeling won't go away. Finally you just decide to carry on with your business.

The rest of your day is fairly uneventful. The neighbor lady yelled at you to stay off her lawn, your parents nagged at you to start taking more responsibilities, all the usual things. You go to bed, still bothered by the weird feeling in your throat. You think to yourself, If it isn't gone by tomorrow, I'll let my parents know about it. It's really starting to annoy, and it feels like it's gotten bigger!

You fall asleep, but it seems like no time at all before you're woken by a pain in your throat, you're choking on that seed you swallowed earlier! Being the imaginative young tyke you are, you jump to the conclusion that the seed has taken root in your stomach and is growing out your mouth (of course this isn't the case, but you don't know any better at your age).

You begin coughing desperately, trying to clear your throat, when suddenly out pops the seed from earlier, but something's wrong. It's over ten times it's original size! Now that it's outside your body, it beings to grow at an exponential rate, until it's about as big as a huge beach-ball. You cautiously approach, wary of something supernatural about all of this. You poke the seed, and jump back as a crack appears right through the middle of it. The seed splits in half, and you see a vaguely humanoid shape curled up on the floor of your room. There's something a little... off, about this figure though, it seems to be covered in fur!

"It can't be," you stammer in disbelief, "Krystal? Is that you? I thought you were just a video game character!"

Krystal, for of course it was she, uncurled and straightened up, looking you right in the eye. "Of course it's me Anthony, who were you expecting?"

"I wasn't expecting to cough up my favorite character from Star Fox, that's for sure!"

"I'm flattered," Krystal replies, "but since you DID cough me up, I suppose I should do some explaining... I regret to inform you that I'm not the REAL Krystal, but merely a perfect copy, brought into existence through a very confusing series of events. The only important thing is that you now have complete power over me. I am your willing servant, ready to cater and obey your every wish and command. Don't worry though, I don't resent it; in fact, I'm rather looking forward to spending a great deal of time with someone as cute and sweet as you!"

You blush at Krystal's kind words, but inside your head your brain is cranking into overdrive. Suddenly having one of your favorite video game characters as a companion and assistant was quite a lot to take in. Not only that, buy Krystal was looking quite... *ahem* attractive in person, aside from the whole species-difference thing.

You snap out of it, and look back at Krystal, "So since you seem to be the more informed one here, any suggestions as to what we can do first?"

Krystal just giggles, as if you had made a joke, "Sorry cutie, but rules are that you have to give the orders around here. I'm not allowed to initiate anything."

"Well we can't really do much at the moment, seeing as how it's the middle of the night and all, but maybe in the morning we can have some adventures."

Krystal's expression becomes slightly worried, "But won't your parents question the anthropomorphic vixen sharing a room with you?"

You shake your head, "No, they really don't pay all that much attention to me, and they're at work all day during the summer. We're safe."

"And your siblings?"

"We all generally keep to ourselves in this house, I stay out of their hair and they return the favor. Think of my room as a safe haven."

The tension leaks out from Krystal's stance, "Okay, you seem to have a plan then, might as well go to sleep and see what the new day brings."

Just then you realize how tired you are. The shock from Krystal's appearance coupled with the meager amount of sleep you've gotten have wiped you out. You fall back onto your pillow and quickly drift off into a deep slumber.

The next morning you wake up to see Krystal sitting at the foot of your bed. "Didn't you sleep at all?"

"Don't have to," she replied, "it seems that I was created without the need for rest. Handy I suppose... Oh, and I almost forgot to tell you, now that you've... uh... summoned (for lack of a better word) me, you can do it again and again to create as many servants as you want. Careful though, it's painful and you have to wait a while between summonings. With that out of the way, what did you have in mind for today?"

You think for a bit, "Well... I suppose it could be fun to mess with my brothers and sisters, or maybe we could..."

choices: Get something to eat, you're starving!
