115112212.content:
The blue furred vixen gave a shy smile, "When I was, I mean when Krystal was being taught to fly the Arwings by Fox McCloud, she often wished to become a pilot instructor. Since I am a replica, I too feel the same. So if you wish it, I could, perhaps teach you to fly?" You nod a bit listening intensely.

"Well that does sound fun," you began, "but I don't think we could do that. Not only do you not have a pilots license, but I don't we could get you their without causing a riot." You easily saw her expression change.

"I see..." Krystal began, " I'm sorry for bringing it up master Anthony." Her voice was low, just barely above a whisper. Something in your head started to click, puting two and two together. But, before jumping the gun you had to make sure.

"Krystal," you took a deep breath in, " you can't do anything unless I instigate it, correct?" She nodded to confirm. " Then as an order, I demand to know something: do you have all of the original Krystal's thoughts, emotions and/or memories?" She was quite, everything was until a small whimper escaped her lips.

"Yes..." the vixen began, "I do." She did her best to hold back her tears. "And I know I am nothing more than a copy, but I..."

"Stop," you said in a strong, demanding tone. You looked deep into her eyes before hugging her. You felt her body jump in shock of what you did. Pulling away, you began to speak once more. "Look, I never really wanted you to be my slave, that's just... wrong, but I guess with this "rule" I have to tell you what to do, don't I? But I want to at least think for yourself. So..." your voice trialled off, " just be my friend." She looked at you with since of confusion until you added "And that's an order."

Krystal gave a small smile, "I shall do so to the best of my abilities."

"Good," you said with a wide grin.

"So what should we do now?" the blue fox asked you tilting her head as she did so.

"Hmmm... Good question..."
115112212.title: Points of Understanding

choices: "I find you incredibly attractive and I..."
"You just seem like a great person to be around..."
1151122121.content:
Your thoughts were interrupted by a rumbling sound from deep within your stomach. You realized that you hadn't eaten yet, and you would usually eat at around this time anyway. You failed to notice that Krystal was eyeing your stomach intently. You blushed as you could tell that she had heard the noises emanating from your stomach.

“I’m guessing that you’re hungry?” Krystal giggled.

“Uh, yeah...” you said, reaching up and scratching the back of your head. “I usually have breakfast around about now.”

“Would you like me to get something for you?” Krystal asked.

“No, it’s fine.” you assured.

“Oh, it’s no trouble.” Krystal pressed.

You sighed, before smiling and looking deep into her eyes. “Krystal, I appreciate the gesture, but I’m perfectly capable getting my own breakfast.” As you finished speaking, you realized that what you said may have come out wrong as Krystal turned her face away from you looked at the floor, a pained expression across her face. “I’m sorry. I didn’t mean it like that. I’m flattered that you want to make me breakfast, but what kind of gentleman would I be if I were to force a lovely lady such as yourself to go to any trouble for me?” you asked, smiling.

“But Anthony, it’s no tr-” you cut her off as you put a finger up to her lips (well... muzzle).

“I insist. You’re my friend, not my servant. Would you like me to make you some breakfast?” you asked, before a thought pooped into your head. “Y-you do eat, don’t you?” you asked sheepishly.

Krystal giggled as you moved your finger away. “I don’t think I have to. I haven’t felt the need to eat, drink, or... um...” Krystal paused “relieve myself since being... hatched... But I would be more than happy to simply watch you eat.” Krystal said, straightening herself up.

“All right.” You smiled as you reached out and gently held Krystal’s slender and slightly furry paw in your hand. “The dining room is this way.”

You led Krystal to the dining room, where you set about pouring yourself some cereal in the kitchen as you motioned for Krystal to take a seat at the table. She pulled up a chair at the table and sat down, looking around at all of the furniture. When you finished pouring your cereal and milk into a bowl, you joined Krystal at the table, sitting opposite her.

As you began to eat, you noticed that Krystal was doing exactly what she said she would: watch you eat. But you noticed an unfamiliar expression deep in her endless bluish eyes. A concern? Or perhaps, an unanswered question?

“Is something the matter?” you asked. “You won’t have to worry about my siblings. I’m the only one awake at this hour. They all like their beauty sleep, even Andy.” You chuckled at your own little joke.

“No, it’s just... um...” Krystal blushed through her face full of fur. “Can I ask you a question?” she asked.

“Of course you can.” you assured her.

“Okay, well... When you said that I-” Krystal stopped abruptly and shook her head before continuing, “Krystal, was your favorite Star Fox character... What did you mean by that?”

You stopped eating, put your spoon in the bowl, and looked up to face the blue-furred vixen. “Well... I... um....” you stammered.
1151122121.title: Breakfast and the Question

1152211.content:
You start thinking about Sonic and how sexy he would be as a female. You then thought (Wait. Why did I think that? It's not like it's actually going to happen.)

Just as you thought that, you suddenly felt sick and said "Good god! Was there something in that apple my stomach didn't like!?"

You start feeling dizzy as you feel something come up. You then threw up an egg that was a little bigger than your mouth.

You then looked at the egg that miraculous didn't break on the floor You then said "That was weird. I wonder what this egg is?" You pick up the egg and noticed something.

You then asked to no one but yourself "Is it me or is this egg getting bigger?" The egg shows signs of being bigger than it was before but not by much.

You don't know much about when eggs hatch but you figure it will hatch eventually. You then thought (Wait. Why did this egg appear?)

You thought about it and you realized that you were thinking about Sonic as a female right when the chest pain happened.

You then theorize that there was something about that apple you ate and it gave you something.

You weren't sure what power you gained but you knew that it had something to do with what you thought the moment you ate the apple.

You decided to wait to see if it was what you thought it might be but until then, you had to keep this a secret from your family for now.

Until you have a better understanding of this unusual turn of events, it's better if it's a secret. You then hear "Is something wrong brother?"

You turn around trying to keep as calm as possible and faced your 10-year old sister. You replied in an sincere voice "Nothing's wrong Zoey."

You saw she was wearing a light blue blouse paired with blue jeans. You saw that she just got back from an outing with her friends carrying a small bag.

Zoey then decides to not look further into it knowing that her brother will come clean about it later.

You then went upstairs as your mother came through the door and asked "Anthony? Have you figured out what high school you're going to go to?"

You replied "Not yet! I'll tell you when I think of it!" You went into your room as you examine the variety of video games merchandise you had.

You start thinking that maybe the female Sonic you thought about will come out of the egg. You feel as though that's the case here but you're not sure what's telling you that.

You then hear "Anthony! Dinner is going to be ready soon so wash up!" You reply "Okay!" You left the egg in a blanket near the window as you went to eat.

You left not noticing that the egg grew bigger in a short time span.

After dinner...

You went back to your room to see the egg ready to hatch. You then closed the door and locked it. You looked on as the egg piece start to fall off.

You see an amazing sight before you as a female Sonic emerged from the egg. She was wearing a red tank top with matching jeans.

(Credit goes to SilverAlchemist09)

http://fc00.deviantart.net/fs43/f/2009/0...

You were unsure what to say to her but then she suddenly says "Hello master." You were surprised at the term she used at the end. You thought (Master?)

The female Sonic then stood up and walked up to you almost as if she was ready for her next order. You then said "Sorry about asking this but did you call me Master?"

The female Sonic then says "Of course I mean you Master! Who else is my master?"

You were quite confused but then you realized that you had more than the ability to bring a fictional girl into reality. You can have her have no free will or personality.

You then asked "What is your name?" The Female Sonic replied "Whatever you wish to call me master."

You thought about a name but coming up with a name on the spot is not easy. You then snap your fingers and said "Okay! Your name is Sonya for now."

Sonya smiled and said "Very well master. If that is your wish, I will obey." Suddenly, someone knocks on the door and asks "Anthony? Is there someone in there with you?"

You then said "Okay Sonya. My first order is to stay out of sight for now!" Sonya then replies "Yes Master!" Sonya then jumps out the window and disappears behind a bush.

You unlock the door and Your mother, Diana, walks into the room. Diana then asks "Was someone up here with you?" You replied "Nope. You must have been hearing things."

Diana was about to say something else but she decided against it. She leaves as you sighs grateful that you picked the fastest thing alive.

You look outside to see Sonya jump back into the room. You then think about what to do next...

115222221.content:
I felt something swelling in my throat and moving up to my mouth. I opened my mouth and an egg came out! It was a little to big to have come out, but it did anyway. It started growing and then started to crack. I stepped back out of fear. Hit started wobbling and fell over. With that action, it broke open and out spilled a yellowish rabbit. It had on an orange dress with a blue ribbon and and a pair of matching shoes. It scrambled up to its feet and walked up to me.
"Are you... Cream the rabbit?" I asked in shock.
"Yes," she replied.
"How did you get here?" I asked as I continued examining her.
"That egg over there. You had it and I came out," she explained.
"What?! That's insane!" I protested.
"It is. If you think it is," she agreed.
"Why are you talking like that?" I asked. She sounded kind of dull, not like herself.
"I have nothing to do, so... Well..." She said.
"Wait... Something's missing..." I said as I looked around.
"What?" She asked as she also looked around.
I focused on something and I felt the swelling in my throat. I spit out a smaller egg and it soon hatched into Cheese the chao. It flew over to Cream and hovered next to her.
"That's better!" I exclaimed.
"What's better?"
I looked over to see my best friend, Amy. Wait! Amy?! How will I explain this to her?!

11523122.title: The master of gap

choices: S-sex...? [Lustfully surprised answer. Does he mean it?]
115231221.content:
It wasn't the brightest of nights out. No it was late at night rather. And yet, despite this fact, there was a house with a room still lit. It was in this room that something akin to a dream or miracle would occur. A boy, 14 years old sat in this room at his computer, the last day of his middle school life between now and tomorrow night. He was spending this near momentous occasion, of which he could hardly sleep playing one of his favorite games. Touhou. More accurately, touhou 7; perfect cherry blossom. He'd been a huge fan of this indie-ish series for a few years now and knew many things about this series. The only thing he really lacked was knowing some specifics like where some characters come from, which games and such. Tonight, he was planning on finally finishing this game. He was on the extra stage boss and he was seconds from victory! His mind was focused, dodge, dodge, graze, bomb there! YES! The sound effects played and it was real. He did it. He was completely d
one...with extra mode. Now normally that IS done. But not here. He saw it. Phantasm mode. "This....this isn't in the other games. It's after extra...after extra?! Oh no..."

No matter how much he whined...he had one more stage to go. How hard could this...be? Well after another two hours of play and many many deaths later he finally managed to get to the END of this and it was apparent this was VERY hard. But here it was, the boss. And it was...Yukari Yakumo?! Well it's no wonder. That either explains why the level is so hard or why she's so powerful. Either way, let's DO THI- he was dead already?...and now he had to...do it again...he immediately hit quit and let his body fall limp in his chair. "Yukari Yakumo...Yukari Yakumo..." This was a phase that was common among those who played this game. You would reach a new enemy who would bring pain and sorrow upon you with their destructive powers and screw you over and all you could think about was them. Many touhou fans had a strange love/hate relationship with the game.

"Yukari Yakumo...Yukari-iiegh?!" He was cut off from his repetition when suddenly something caught in his throat and he stood up, stumbling around before falling to the ground on his hands and knees. Something HUGE was in there! He tried to cough it up as it entered his mouth and he immediately spat it out. An egg? Why was there and egg...then a crack appeared and the egg grew, alot. It grew larger and larger and cracked more. He crawled back, sitting in awe before it broke right open to reveal...guess who?

"Yukari Yakumo..." He muttered once more as out of the egg sat up the gap youkai herself, wearing nothing...her flowing blonde hair was covered by no hat, her quite ample chest held by nothing, she looked to him and smile before speaking. "Hello master, how may I serve you?"
115231221.title: Speak of the devil.

1152312212.content:
Note: "deward" made this, I am just fixing things up.

Before he could really make a decision, or even think of what was going on something else, somehow, came out of the egg. Something that simply set Anthony's mind even further into shock mode. Another woman seemed to sit up in the egg, looking a bit tired as she yawned and stretched. This woman was instantly recognized by Anthony as well. She was slender, very curvaceous, a bright blonde with fox ears on her head and a glaringly obvious nine golden tails attached to her lower back. It was Ran Yakumo, Yukari Yakumo's shikigami, or servant and the extra stage boss, as well as phantasm stage mid boss of touhou 7. Very, very powerful. The only thing that could've made it more obvious was if she were in her usual attire. Which she wasn't. In fact she too had just as much a lack of clothing as Yukari. W-well if Yukari was here then I guess where else would Ran be?

"Mmm, have we arrived Yukari-sama?" Ran asked formally as though it were expected. W-was this on purpose? Wait, if Yukari was here and so Ran was here as a result, then didn't that mean if Ran was here then as a result... "*Yaaaawwn*...Ran-Shama..." Came the mutterings of what sounded like a young girl when lo and behold, the very girl he expected crawled up to the edge of the egg as well. A young looking, maybe 8-9 year old girl at least as she looked appeared with dark brown hair and cat ears on her head, one of them pierced with a big golden hoop. Her two swishing black tails were much smaller than Ran's but they weren't supposed to compare. This girl showed two sharp fangs in her mouth as she yawned and her eyes were slitted like a cats. Chen was this girl's name. The stage 2 boss and extra stage mid boss. The weakest of the three but definitely not 'weak'. Did they all really fit in there? I guess it wouldn't be impossible for Yukari...Augh, he was thinking like this was no big deal! W-wait, were those collars on all of them? Yeah, they were all wearing pet collars, like a dog would wear!

"Take a look around Ran. I'd expect you to be more perceptive than that. We're at our new home~" She said cheerily, nothing else in her voice. New home? W-what? At least two of the most powerful people in Gensokyo suddenly pop up into his room from an egg that came from his mouth and they call this place home?! He needed an explanation and a damn moment to think!

"Hold up! Just stop for a second! Please, what is going on here?! In order, why did you sprout from an egg from my mouth, why are you naked, why did you ask how you can serve me, and why are you calling my home yours?" Anthony asked them in an assertive way. He wasn't one for trying to piece together other's ramblings.

"My apologies Master, Ran and Chen, please be quiet." She ordered her two underlings. She stood up in her bountifully curved beauty and stepped out of the egg onto the actual carpet of his room and proceeded to sit on her knees facing him. "We arrived like that mostly because of you. You summoned us to be your slaves. Why? Well because I was craving such a handsome master as you~ Or at least that's the explanation you can comprehend. We are like this because we are customizable as you see fit and we will wait obediently for you to decide what we wear~" So it was all her doing after all... wait, master?!

"Of course, the collars are a symbol I added to show our connection to you~ As for why I asked how to serve you? Well, your power absolutely labeled me as your slave so it's only natural. And of course by extension, Ran and Chen as well~" She explained before beckoning to two. Ran and Chen both stood, Chen more energetically than Ran, and walked out of the egg shell as well, sitting down in a similar fashion as Yukari. Ran on her left, Chen on her right. The differences between them became easy to compare. Chen had such a small body compared to them. Yukari and Ran were very close in sizes but Ran just barely outdid her master overall. Not by 'too' much though....w-wait, why was he paying attention to that?!

"And lastly, seeing as we will be serving you as you see fit, is it wrong to call this place our home? Maybe you have doghouses already prepared for us?" She said in a way that almost sounded little like it was trying to guilt-trip him but, scarily enough, it was counter-acted by a hint of excitement... "I hope those are sufficient answers. Ran, Chen, say hi~" She looked to them both and then back to Anthony. "Hello master, it is wonderful to meet you. I hope I can satisfy you in every way." Ran was first with a surprisingly...determined promise of pleasing him. Kitsunes do supposedly make great wives... "Hello master~ I'm Chen! Please let me serve you plenty!" Chen sounded very excited as she introduced herself. He wouldn't lie, it was pretty cute.

"R-right. That's about as good of an explanation as I'm going to get I suppose...A-and this 'power' you said I had?" He knew it might've been rude but he asked another question. They were supposedly obedient, right? "Ah yes, a power that lets you summon any girl you can imagine from any fictional work or even real life. You can still use it however you like and on whomever you like but it can be a painful process at first so please use it sparingly at first master, don't hurt yourself~ If you so choose, you can control those you summon in a number of ways. For instance, with just a thought you can command a girl you 'own' to say or do what you like. With practice anyways, though verbal commands are more understandable and work out more specifically but can be less convenient. Mentally, you can command us from anywhere. You can also enter the body of a girl, under your command or not, physically as a whole by transforming into a liquid form and entering their body or spiritually which would leave your body 'hollow' while you took full control of the girl you chose. This includes any special physical or metaphysical capabilities." This was quite the explanation, and quite the power...

"You can enslave girls by entering their bodies as well, placing a suggestion in their subconscious mind while you're in their that can rewire their brains, whether immediately or over time if you like watching them change for you little by little, to become attracted and eventually obedient to you." Yukari explained his power rather thoroughly actually. Well...today is being quite eventful...it was still hard to believe that Yukari, one of THE most powerful touhou characters was right in front of him as HIS slave...wait a minute.

"What about YOUR power?" He asked slightly cautiously, already knowing a bit about it but wanting to bring it up. Yukari's grin grew as she looked at him. "Manipulation of gaps, borders and boundaries? Oh it's nothing 'too' special, just enough to play god and do whatever I, or in this case whatever 'you', wish~" She responded promisingly in an almost tempting tone...If his tent had died down any time in the previous conversation, it was back now. As far as he noticed anyways. He was surprised a bit ago and he still was but this was sounding an awful lot like the break of breaks. If this was a dream...maybe he didn't want to wake up.

"Well for now, what I want is..."
1152312212.title: Something else strange occurs.

choices: He stayed up all night, only a few minutes til the bus arrives!
11523122121.content:
"-for all of you to get dressed. I can't have somebody wandering in here and seeing two grown women, and not to mention one underage looking girl, naked and collared in my room. Although it'd be strange for you to be seen in here at all but that's a matter for later as well. Mom's already asleep...everyone is asleep now that I think about it. That's lucky I guess. As for what to wear um...come up with something..." Anthony was a bit crabby due to his lack of sleep and abundance of mental surprise, as well as unable to think properly. Though he was still in the middle of his teen years and he couldn't help his own raging hormones so he was only confused, yet not opposed, to the image that popped into his head of the three of them standing there in something skimpy like bunnygirl suits. Why? His mind was too strained to come up with an answer. He stood up and turned around to walk over to his bed where he left his phone, intending to check the time and maybe mess around to distract himself for a little bit. He needed a bit of normality, just for a bit, before he could adapt.

"Whatever you wish master~" Came the response by Yukari who had a genuine looking smile on as she stood up, signalling Ran and Chen to do so as well which they did almost in sync with Yukari. As they did, Yukari raised her hand and seemingly grabbed the air and pulled it open to reveal one of her famous gaps, all while Anthony had his back turned with his phone to check texts and posts, and pulled it down around them before they reappeared the same, only now they were miraculously dressed in the tight, sleek, revealing outfits he failed to ask for in the first place. A display of her power and connection to him if nothing else.

"Maybe I could tell somebody about thi-Iiiss!" He stretched the end of that statement in surprise when he turned around to see his wish fulfilled. They really were dressed in such a way! His eyes were fixated on them as he scanned their bodies up and down, all of them seeming to be just fine with this, smiling even! Chen's body, thing but charming was gripped firmly by the clothing. Yukari's suit formed smoothly to her, lifting her surprisingly perky chest and squeezing her sensational hips. Ran was no different, only there was just a bit more to hold. His body was tingling slightly, he could feel a 'stiffening' sensation as well. Quickly though, he wanted to get back in control of both the situation, and himself.

"O-okay, you've done good enough! J-just dress yourself in something casual! W-what you usually wear!" It was a bit big of a shock for him and he easily decided it was also a bit big of a step for him as well. The quickest thing that came to mind was just what was normal for them, even if it was strange fashion for here. Like previously, Yukari repeated the motion of her arm and pulled the gap around them before it subsided to reveal them only this time they were in their safe, although possibly slightly downsized, attire. I say downsized because the clothes did seem a little tight around them. Probably an idea by Yukari for his pleasure.

"How is this? Will this do?" She asked him simply although he asked for it like she wanted extra approval for some reason. He simply nodded to her before sighing and taking a seat on his bed. His mind was still skeptical but now seeing the possibilities...there was a certain excitement to it. He wouldn't lie. He just needed time is all, geez...what WAS the time anyways? He pulled his phone up to look at it's clock before...
11523122121.title: Rome wasn't built in a day...right?

choices: "Go home and figure out how you're going to live with me."
"Stay around the school for me so I can keep an eye on you."
115231221212.content:
"Oh crap! It's 7 already?! I stayed up all night with you girls! School is gonna start in, like, 15 minutes! G-gotta change! Do I have time to brush my teeth? Maybe barely, I hope! Jeans, jeans, jeans!" He panicked as he didn't want to be late for school today, god forbid him not going at all! He normally walked or rode his bike because the school was so close, rather than taking the bus, but he didn't have much time here. He was pretty sure the bus is already gone too. He sprang to action, searching his drawer to look for clothes when Yukari stepped up, grabbing his should and pulling a flashy little gimmick of pulling him towards her through a gap that formed between them. When he went through he was pulled face first into her cushion-y chest in some kind of hug before she evened him out, gently pushing him away to look at him. She was surprisingly tall actually. He was eye to eye with her chest at best, which wasn't a bad thing for him. And Ran was even a bit taller than her!

"What was that for?! I don't have time to mess arou-huh?" He noticed he felt different when he pulled away from her grip and he looked down at himself, fully clothed in a pair of new jeans with a belt, his shoes and socks and even his favorite shirt that had a colorful nintendo logo on it. He licked around in his mouth as well and they felt like he just got out from a dentist appointment! His hair felt smooth and clean, he checked his phone real quick and not even a minute passed!

"Huh...well that works too. Er, thank you!" He told her with an actual smile. He felt a bit fresher too. She simply smiled warmly back to him and replied with a simple "You're welcome~". Ran had come back into the room too...w-wait, when did she leave?! What was that she was holding? A...plate? With...eggs, toast and sausage? Hold on now, he didn't even think they had sausage! And it's only been a couple minutes!! She was good at that...He took the plate from her and even tried a bite and discovered just how perfectly everything was done!

"Wow! This is incredible! But I don't even have 10 minutes. I won't make it on time. I'll just have to get to class late. It will suck but it won't be as late as it could've been." He said in awe, the stress mostly leaving him until he realized he couldn't see Chen in here anywhere. This was solved however when she crawled out from under the bed carrying some pieces of clothing that must have gotten kicked under there a while ago. It was also just apparent to him that his room suddenly looked a good bit more tidy. She was quick, that's for sure. Maybe this...wouldn't be so bad!

"Master, why are you worrying about going somewhere?" Yukari asked him as though he were over exaggerating. He simply looked at her like he had just explained everything. Her answer to that look was walking behind him, letting her arms hang around his front, gently around his body with her chest pressed up against the back of his head, all almost seductively, and falling backwards into a gap with him before appearing with him right next to his school. Literally a few inches from it's side. Ran and Chen were brought along and Somewhere along the way they managed to change into more normal clothing. Yukari and Ran were in purple-ish and blue suits respectively, Yukari even had a pair of glasses to match. Chen was in a red T-shirt with a black skirt. Ran and Chen's ears and tails were somehow hidden as well. Yukari had a half smug, half gentle grin on her face when she saw his surprise. He simply stared and looked down to his phone to see 8 minutes left. A smile appeared on his face too before he ran up and hugged Yukari.

"Thank you! You guys are wonderful!" Suddenly having them around seemed like a much better thing. He forgot one of her, believed, uses for gaps was getting across huge distances instantly. And now that he wasn't so worn out and frustrated, he could admit to himself that the very concept of what happened was awesome and his excitement finally started kicking in, skyrocketing even. He repeated it in his head. Yukari, Ran, and Chen were his to own and he could summon any girl he could ever want to join them. It was unrealistic, yes in every way, but there was nothing more he could ever ask for. He just had to work out how life would work from now on. Maybe Yukari could do something about their living arrangements back home.

"I'm very happy to help master~ Now then, what would you like of us from here?" Yukari asked him, awaiting orders which admittedly seemed weird because she was one to do as she pleased. But not with him. "Maybe you guys can..."
115231221212.title: Bring your slaves to school day!

choices: Follow their hijinks through the school.
Follow Anthony's perspective in his classes.
1152312212122.content:
"Just stick around the school for a while so I can keep an eye on you. At least every now and then. If anyone asks, just say you're visiting relatives. If anyone asks how you're related to me, just say you're my aunts or something. Chen would be, like, my cousin. Nobody should really bother asking too much though so there's not much to worry about." He reasoned as he took a moment to think. There shouldn't be any more to it. He just had to attend a few classes and he'd be done for the day. Though with how close it was to the end of the year all of his classes were pretty dull. Not much to learn but still forced to go through 'educational practices'. Reviews for the most part.

"As you wish master. If there is anything you need of us, just call or think it. And don't forget your powers either~" She reminded him about the implications of his abilities before watching run off to get to his first class. He didn't have his backpack which she was going to get for him but he stated that he didn't need it for a day like today. She smiled and waved, Ran watched as well and Chen almost immediately started running off as well. Ran caught her thankfully before she went and caused unnecessary strife. Yukari turned to the both of them.

"We cannot be with him today Yukari-Sama?" Ran asked a tad worried. Seemed like her mental and emotional connection to young Anthony was mysteriously strong. Most likely an effect of Anthony himself wishing she were like that and therefor it was so. But the level of obsession seemed a bit odd. She seemed scared to not follow him around. Yukari took control of her own servant however. This seemed like quite the chain of command.

"We'll be close enough. We'll have time later on though so don't worry. For now let us explore and pass time. We can please him however we can through the day, I'm sure." Yukari put Ran at ease with her words. As she suggested, they began their trek on foot throughout the school grounds. It was actually a pretty big place. A lot of people too. How would they fit in? Maybe that was up to them. Would we find out or would we see what the main man Anthony has to go through?
1152312212122.title: Wandering spirits lurk the halls.

choices: Follow Yukari on her manipulative quest.
Follow Ran and Chen for reconassaince.
11523122121221.content:
"Let's explore and see what this little place has to offer, shall we?" Yukari suggested as she began walking, Chen and Ran following right behind her. This place wasn't really little but it wasn't anything that incredible in size. Although she had no idea where she was going, it didn't matter because she didn't expect to. They were out front of the large structure and identified it to be a modern American school rather than the Japanese setting they were normally used to. Though seeing the plant life being surprisingly abundant was a little unanticipated, even for Yukari. The artwork of the buildings was also somewhat appealing to the eye.

"I must say, humans here have been taking care of themselves. Although it isn't anything all that amazing, but it is a little more than I thought would've been." Ran said, not having expected too much from the outside world herself. Admittedly the air wasn't as fresh as back in Gensokyo but she had no problem adapting for her master's sake. Rather, maybe she should be optimistic about what can be found out here. The kinds of people he knows, who's a friend and who isn't, who's an enemy and maybe even if there's a...girl he might be interested in. Yes. That was important to know if she is to serve her new master. Which ones are allies and which are targe- I mean not. Certainly the bit- girl he would like would be an ally...yes.

"Ran? Are you feeling alright? You had a strange and...dark look on your face for a second." Yukari spoke up in curiosity at her Shikigami's behavior. Even she was a little weird-ed out by it. Hopefully it wasn't anything 'too' troublesome. Well, she knows her place hopefully. "Just be aware that if you do anything against my order, I will be happy to express my distress. And if you do anything against 'his' order, anything to make him upset or hurt, I'll gladly bring you back to a 1-tailed fox with my own hands. But I know you and you're reasonable, you've served me for so long now that I have faith in you~" Yukari set a very dangerous boundary, non literally, for Ran to keep the Nine-tailed fox in her place. Chen was off playing in a nearby field, running after some birds so she wasn't around for the promise of danger. Ran looked at Yukari a little shocked but surprisingly lowered her head in a way that obviously felt shamed.

"Yes Yukari-Sama, my apologies. I was thinking a bit selfishly but no more. But...might I ask for permission to follow him and watch his interactions with others?" Ran seemed genuine in her proposal and acted formal once more. "I simply wish to help identify the place of those around him. Perhaps Chen could act as a medium for gifts or services and assist me?" She figured, no, she KNEW Chen would be as happy to do so as she.

"Hmm...very well. You seem to understand the implications of your actions. Very well but remember it's not considered a...good act to be peeking at someone from around a corner or such. Be discreet, you haven't lost your power. And I shall interact with the staff of the school and make ourselves a little more casually known. Try to gain influence and maybe fix a few things for him, but nothing too abnormally noticeable~" Yukari agreed and helped formulate a strategy, just based around Anthony's life at school. Determination can sprout in anything it seemed. Yukari waved Ran off as Ran called for Chen. When those two regrouped, the parted ways with Yukari for their work as Yukari left for hers.
11523122121221.title: Follow their hijinks through the school.

choices: Go for a little joyride with this new power.
115231221212212.content:
"Now then, his first class is over in that building..." Ran stated as she walked through the campus with Chen playfully marching right behind her. Ran showed a certain eagerness in finding Anthony once more as she quickly walked around to the side of the building his class was in. "His class is over in this side." She walked along the outside of the freshly painted wall that made the school building until she found the windows to his class. She quickly sidled up against the wall and took a quick, stealthy peek into the room and thankfully his desk was seated right next to the window. She went to ever so carefully open the window just a crack but stopped to consider the 'variables' such as; noise out here? She listened...silent, check. window's condition? She barely pressed on the frame of it and found no real reaction. It seemed sturdy. Check. Alright, it should be safe.

"I'll just take a peek and listen in. Should be no problem~" Ran quietly, but optimistically said. She very gently gripped the window frame and lifted it up the least noticeable amount and listened as sound suddenly poured out. Humans had handy advancements. Windows that kept out sound entirely? Not something found back home. Of course...it also kept her from hearing her master.

"-Alright so to review, in finding the measurements of the vertical angles we can use simple algebraic format to put these two equations equal to each other to find 'X' which, in turn, lets us fully solve the equations. It's really quite simple, isn't it?" The voice of an older woman played out through the window in an explanation of such simple mathematics. Ran took a peek and saw what they were talking about and easily had the answer in her head.

"Well, master is young so I'd be foolish to expect him to think like me." Ran told herself, sitting beneath the window and listening to the teacher and students. She would only really pay attention when she heard Anthony's voice and when his name was mentioned, likewise she would think absolutely nothing of those who answered questions except Anthony who she praised in her head each time he got an answer right. She noticed, however minute of a detail it was, that he answered quicker than the other students. Of which she proudly accentuated in her mind.

"Of course he's special compared to all of them regardless. Really now, what else did I expect?" Ran told herself. It wasn't obvious to her of course but to Chen, who was casually sitting next to Ran with her knees on one side and hands over to the other side to support her, it was rather comically obvious that Ran was obsessing like a school girl might towards a crush. Not that Chen would know what that even was.

"Ran-Shama, how much longer is this class? It's a little confusing to me?" Chen innocently whispered to her own master. Her mind was so underdeveloped in comparison to Ran's so it wasn't a big surprise that even this level of math wouldn't find it's way too easily into her head. Of course it's not like she was paying attention. She was just bored was all. She'd rather be up close to Anthony, sitting in his lap and snuggling up against him as he pet her and stroked her hair. She'd feel his young but lean body, her fingers gently caressing his chest and the scent of his breath...the touch of his hands if they a little too 'off course'...then she snapped out of it and her eyes flew open once more. She then proceeded to just sit there, trying to figure out what was just with her. Thankfully Ran wasn't watching.

"Don't worry Chen, this class is only...50 minutes I think. That won't be that bad. He only has...7 classes, plus lunch period. It can't be that bad." And. She. Was. Wrong. The class droned on with no real interaction between students or with the teacher. They sat there and listened to repetitive lessons, reviews, explanations, examples, hell even personal life stories of the teacher that were irrelevant completely! 50 minutes felt like 2 hours before the bell rang. Ran and Chen both had fallen asleep lying on the grass outside the window, Ran on her back and Chen lying down on Ran, using her chest as a pillow.

"W-what?! I-is that a sign that it's over? In the name of the gods...that was first period. Human children are subjected to such torment...I'm making him the best damn dinner he's ever had after all of this." Ran promised herself, thinking about the impossibility of children not becoming insane from...how many days was it? 180? Per year? Wow...

And so the day continued through second period which had no windows so Ran was forced to use a spell to listen in on the room. It was science. Something not really known in Gensokyo. She listened in for the next 50 minutes of class and realized that it was rather simple models and examples of the way chemicals and physics worked. At the very least it wasn't lecturing but actually hands on for part of it at least. It gave her a couple interesting points of view to say the least.

Third period was P.E. and Ran found it surprisingly not boring. Why? Because she could use her magic to spy in the changing rooms. Where he changed almost completely. Save for those boxers...a-anyways. She watched him stretch so well, side to side, bending over in those shorts, so flexible~ Ah, er, Afterwards it was watching him exercise for the next 45 minutes. Working up such a hard earned sweat, showing off his body and muscles...he'd get so tired and look so tough when all that adrenaline in him worked up...Ran labeled this the 'happy hour' in her head. Her favorite period.

When the bell then rang, it became obvious that it was the lunch period where the students got an hour of free time. Well that's only necessary in a place like this. It seemed they weren't fully supervised and were able to go about the campus as they wished so long as they got to class afterwards on time. She saw Anthony walking out of P.E. exhaustively and heading for the 'cafeteria' as strange a name that was for lunch. The lines were orderly, almost unnaturally so, and the kids seemed to group together in certain ways. One group of kids over there, a different one there, simple nature. She noticed though that Anthony sat mostly alone with one or two other kids, but he still seemed very content and happy talking with them. She remembered their looks. A brown haired girl with blue eyes and a white haired boy, which was enough to identify him any time. She smiled knowing he had friends.

After that little reprieve, the cursed bell rang out of nowhere once again to signal that it was time for fourth period. For Anthony, that was literature. Ran's mind wanted to pass this time. She completely ignored this class. Just...it was useful in a sense but she wasn't about to go through all that when she didn't need it. Next class please.

The bell rang and the next class was...language arts? 5 minutes into the class: Oh. My. God. Ran's mind was baffled by the concept of this. They needed an entire class based around the differences in spelling and pronunciation. There was nothing to say about this class...at least the teacher was nice enough.

The final stretch...next was history? A worthy subject...but boring nonetheless. Not terrible though. There was reading and interactions between students on work based around the historical events and achievements of past great figures. That wasn't so bad. She didn't really know much about the past of this country but that wasn't important for her. Time went by decently fast this time. Onto the last class.

"Art? Ffffffinaly. A class that does something. It's not exactly 'educational' but it's an enjoyable activity and good relief for the mind and body." Ran wearily reasoned in any way she could. It was almost over. Just a little longer. This class was the saving grace of the day. She watched a bit relieved as they were instructed on different visual tricks and tips on clean drawing. All in all, user friendly and entertaining. Letting imagination roam rather than memorization. The class eventually ended, the final bell signaling that school was OVER! For the day...she met him quickly out front of the building, a ways off to the side where the moment they had gotten within reasonable earshot of each other, Ran rushed up to him and enveloped in a tight hug, his head buried in her chest.

"Thank goodness it's over and you're free! Are you okay?! I-i mean did anyone bully you or anything?" Ran quickly allowed him to break away as she looked with a worried expression. She almost downright let him know she had been following him. Chen had seemed to tiredly walk up to him and latch her arms around him exhaustively. Thankfully no one was around to misinterpret it.

"N-no, no one bullied or anything. I'm fine! You're doting and being clingy. Geez. It's too good." He remarked at the end with a little blush only to be truthful to the fact that he DID enjoy it. Ran simply smiled warmly to him, apologizing playfully. To her, this kind of behavior from her was only normal towards a male she liked. It's a trait of hers to care for those close to her. It was hard to tell if she was a lovely wife figure or a motherly figure. Either or sounded good, if weird, to him honestly.

"There you all are, hello dear master~" Yukari finally arrived on the scene the same way they saw her last. It didn't seem like she decided to do much.

"Hey, yeah we're here. And I'm tired. We should get going." Now he needed to relax and think of where to go next. He could go home as normal but then he stopped to think. Actually think. With Yukari, he could go wherever he wanted and do whatever he wanted with her and them. He could get what he wanted, women he wanted even...
115231221212212.title: Follow Ran and Chen for reconassaince.

1152312212122121.content:
"Well I have test subjects back home too. I should stop and enjoy my current toys before I go off and get more." He said out loud casually to the women around him who smiled back obediently as Yukari took that moment to step up like she were pre-instructed and open up a gap back home to his room. She took Anthony by the hand and led him through, followed shortly after by Ran and Chen before the whole thing closed up. They found themselves right back in the nice, and now clean, little room they started in. Anthony stopped for a second thought out loud, particularly at the three.

"Wait, what am I gonna do about my family? My brothers and sisters will find the three of you if you just walk around and trying to be stealthy won't work. Not for very long at least..." Anthony fretted at the thought. That is, until, Yukari stepped up which he noticed and realized that she was going to suggest he use her powers to fix things up. Or at least that's what he thought but what she really said was a bit more surprising...

"Why don't you just use your power to change the boundary between normal and abnormal so they think it's just typical that we're here?" She suggested with an innocent look on her face. Anthony however had a confused look on his face.

"My power? W-what? Don't you mean your power? You're the one who controls gaps and boundaries." He replied to her in a tone like it was obvious and what she said was silly. However her expression gained a sly smile as she looked at him, stepping up very closely to his body and nearly whispering intimately to him.

"Ah, but I AM referring to your power. Because you see, a side-effect of your power that wasn't mentioned is that whenever you summon yourself a girl like me or Ran or Chen, you obtain their powers for your own use. It's only expected that when you summon someone to be your slave, you should be stronger than them. So to fulfill that, your power makes it so that whatever I or Ran can do, you can do too~ At least with special abilities like Ran's magic or my manipulation of boundaries. You have such a loophole abusing power as mine now for your leisure~" She explained in an easy to understand way. Needless to say, Anthony was stunned. He could use the powers of all those he summoned? He held out his hand and with only the thought of doing it, poked his hand through the air itself into a gap, exactly like Yukari's, only this one didn't have eyes all over in it and was greenish rather than purple. Where it led? Well, wherever it was it was warm and soft...he squeezed his hand real quickly, only to be answered by a yelp from Chen who grabbed her chest. Anthony immediately pulled his hand out.

"W-wow! I have an ability like this. This is amazing!" He decided to ignore that little thing with the gap and move on happily. A big smile crept across his face as the thought of all he could do on his own was just so tremendous! Still, first thing's first, he had to make sure the non-human women in his room were no different from the walls or ceiling to his family. With a wave of his hand he could feel something shift but he couldn't see anything. He was cautious but nonetheless he decided to test this power by grabbing Yukari by the hand, leading to a rather joyful response from her, and led her out into the main hall where his sister Mia was walking through.

"A-ah! Hi Mia." He greeted. Mia smiled at him, walking past him with a pleasant "Hey bro~" Before continuing on. You know, despite the tall, blonde and busty woman standing hand in hand with Anthony. A huge grin couldn't be held back from his face as he laughed and decided to celebrate his beautiful discovery by turning to Yukari and getting her to lean down a bit as he planted a quick kiss right on her lips, pulling away to look joyfully into her eyes which looked a little surprised, though pleasantly, and stare at her blushing, gently smiling face in return.

"You're wonderful Yukari! So many things have been going right because of you! I love you~" He blurted out before giving her a full on hug. Yukari only blushed and hugged him tightly back. Considering her affinity with him already, hearing him say that simply set her off. It was a light feeling in her chest as she held him tenderly to her.

"But you're more wonderful than I master!" She encouragingly replied to him. God, she did love him back. Working for him like this felt pretty good after all! Ran came out of his bedroom, seeing the moment and wishing she could join in. She remained silent though and waited. Anthony opened his eyes and saw her standing there, feeling his energy moving him, he beckoned her to get in on the fun too.

"Ran, don't leave us in the cold, get in here!" He told her. She almost immediately responded by getting on the other side of him and tightly wrapping herself into a hug with him. Well, it was more like hugging Yukari with him in between but she didn't mind. He was there and that was what really mattered to her! Boy, anyone could look at this scene right now and feel nothing but envy towards Anthony who's head could only be partly seen from the outside of the pairs of breasts enveloping it. It wasn't long before Chen also came out and noticed the big hugging scene, not waiting to be told to before running up and squeezing herself up against him, hugging him from the side. The whole scene was fairly heart-warming, in fact very much so. After a little bit however, he slowly started breaking up the hug, mentally of course because he couldn't talk. Yukari and Ran let him go and Chen bounced around him.

"Alright then, I'm getting hungry so I hope you don't mind getting to cooking something Ran. And Yukari, start working on expanding this place if you don't mind! This home is nice, but now that you're here, so many things could be improved! First off, set up a barrier to make sure this place stays MY place alone. Then start stretching it out and give me more space in here. And Chen, if you don't mind cleaning up a little~?" He gave them their orders and they each happily nodded, quickly moving to do just as asked. Anthony walked over and sat down on a chair with a sigh and a satisfied look on his face. Now came the matter of what he got to do with his time. Which was anything. He could gap himself out and hit the bar for all he cared. Not that he wanted to drink. Maybe he'd mess around with his family a bit? Or with one of his girls? Maybe he'd even spawn himself a new girl! So many options...

1152322222222222222222222222222211222222.content:
It was around 8'o clock at night on a Saturday as a horrible thunder storm raged on outside. You were inside, thankfully, and playing a game on your Nintendo Ds whose battery was on red due to having been playing it for seven hours straight.

You were in the middle of a battle where you had to protect your comrade Io, who you have come to like along with many of the other characters from the devil survivor series, from being killed by demons while simultaneously trying to stop her from dying via a demon summoning ritual that she was forced to perform in order to save everyone's lives.

"Ah frick!" you scream at your Ds as Io once more takes damage from a demon who managed to avoid your attack. Fortunately you manage to kill the demon and save Io from dying. However just as the Mission Complete screen appears on then you sigh relieved "Thank god that's over, I was worried for a sec-"
Suddenly the screen flashes brightly, Io had completed the demon summoning ritual to your amazement. She was glowing with a bright green aura and suddenly all the other characters on the screen ran away for some unknown reason. You ignore them and watch as Io jumps into the air, materializing a huge energy lance and then throw it to the ground.

The screen begins to shake and suddenly a huge dragon erupts out of the ground where Io was standing! The dragon lets out a loud roar as it rockets into the air and attacks a large purple blob like monster that's name was Mizar.

"Whoa! That was...awesome" you cheer striking a victory pose when suddenly you hear the sound of sad music coming from the game. You quickly turn back to the game and see that everyone was crowded around Io who was lying unconscious on the floor. "Io?" You click the A button and watch in shock as Io suddenly convulses up blood. "Io! What the hell? Io what's wrong" you ask as if the game will answer you. It does...but not the way you wanted.

"Io..." you select the option and suddenly Io's body begins to glow with a similar green aura from earlier but suddenly Io lets out a loud scream of pain and shakes violently before finally she lies still, a pool of blood forming underneath her.

“Io is dead” the text goes across the screen and then suddenly the power cuts out, not only on the Ds but the entire house falls dark, leaving you in a grim silence.

“Io…” you say silently and begin to cry. Io was your favorite character and watching her die like that was just horrible.

“Da-“you begin to choke something was stuck in your throat and you began to gag. You stumble forward in the darkness, tripping over the coffee table that was right in front of your moments before. You slam into the living room floor and groan in pain. “Ow…” you manage to say just before you stand back up only to slip on something and smash your head into the coffee table. You lie there for a minute before you black out, unaware that your head was bleeding and that a large round object fell out of your mouth upon falling to the floor.
1152322222222222222222222222222211222222.title: A blackout and blacking out

1152322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Chapter One: Refresh Your Memory
You have just got home from your last day of school before summer break, and your family has to be away for different reasons, meaning you have the whole house to yourself. You open the refrigerator to get something to eat, and you get out an apple. You take a bite out of the apple, but suddenly a ball of light hits the apple, which catches you by surprise and causes you to accidentally swallow one of the seeds, the ball of light had gone into that seed and turned it into a magic seed. You then think about your favorite games, books, TV shows, Manga/Anime/Cartoons, and Visual Novels. Your think of a specific girl in one of them. Which category is it?






Oh the seas are calling ye. Which lass shall ye choose to pillage by your side?





Your mind conjures up the Brigand King Gretchen Goldfang: Profile: http://yppedia.puzzlepirates.com/Gretche...

Note: I did not write this, the last cicada did.

1152322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Samus Aran?

1152322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Anthony chewed the apple absentmindedly, unaware of what events he was about to put into motion. Tossing the core into the trash, he walked up the stairs to his room and sat down on his bed to ponder what he should do next. Video games always seems like a good idea; it's just a question of what to play. He'd started to get bored of Mario for the time being, so what else did he have...His eye caught his copy of Metroid Prime on his rug, and he grinned. Now there was a fine game, Anthony thought. He could play it over and over without getting tired. And that Samus Aran...what a protagonist! She was a strong, independent woman who took crap from nobody, and Anthony admired that about her. Well, that and her great bod...what he would do to her if he got the chance...mmmm...

As he fantasized about the bounty hunter, Anthony began to cough. The coughs grew bigger until he could no longer stay seated on his bed. He fell onto the floor, beginning to choke as he felt something large working its way out of his throat and into his mouth. Oh man, what the hell could be causing him so much pain?!

"Blegh!" The object, which Anthony now identified as an egg, fell out of his mouth somehow as his coughs and hacks began to cease. Breathing heavily, Anthony studied the egg. He definitely didn't remember swallowing that! So where had it come from?

Before he could ponder the egg's origins any further, said object began to pulse and grow in size. Anthony's eyes widened and he ran for the door to his room. If this thing was going to explode, he'd better get out of there fast! He ran out into the hallway, spun around, and slammed the door shut, using his own body as extra weight. Then he heard it.

CRACK!

...'crack'?

What kind of explosive goes 'crack'?

Anthony pauses, realizing that if that was actually an egg instead of an explosive, then that cracking noise might of meant that something had hatched from it. In other words, something was now loose in his room! Anthony paled at the thought, internally debating whether or not he should go back in to see the hatchling. The choice was taken out of his hands, however, when the door to his room was forcibly kicked down on top of him.

As he got a good look at the one who had kicked his door down, he gasped.

No. Freaking. Way.

The one who had broken the door to his room, locking eyes with him, was none other than intergalactic bounty hunter Samus Aran.
1152322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Advent of the bounty hunter

1152322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Ash's Mom?

1152322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Well after his near choking experience, Anthony feeling a little weak made his way to lay down on his parents double. It was a lot bigger then his single bed and usually he wasn't allowed to lay on it when they were around. But since they weren't here who was going to stop him. However as the young man jumped onto the bed he suddenly felt sick and leaning over the bed he vomited.

"O on mum's gunna kill" Anthony thought as he looked down. However to his surprise there was no sick. Yet instead there was a small pink colourer egg.

That was strange he never ate and egg today. Still wanting to hide the egg he picked it up and moved it into his room before returning to his parents room to lay down. Normal at this time Anthony would be dreaming about him being some hero or something however this time in his dreams all he could dream about was the mother of ash Ketchum, Delia Ketchum.

A tall, thin women with brown eye and long brown hair he dreamed about her and him at the bench playing in the sand and when he got ice cream on his face she wiped it off before giving him a small kiss on the cheek. However it was then he was disturb form his slumber when someone shook him by his shoulders.

Annoyed by the shaking he quickly woke up to find it was..
1152322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Mommy egg

choices: Talk to her about you and this whole feeling.
Get her to do some naughty things with him.
1152322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Anthony couldn't believe it. He rubbed his eye before finally Delia sat on the bed edge looking at him. Anthony tried his best to look at her back, but his eyes kept wondering down to her uncovered c cup breasts and long legs.

"Hello" Delia said in her sweet voice. Anthony answered her back with a hi before asking her what she was doing here. Delia however didn't know. All she knew was she had a son who was on a Pokémon journey. Anthony guessed Delia might have come form the egg he coughed up early after all it is possible. Still getting up Anthony once again got an eye full of Delia body before she asked him if there was anything she could do for him.


"Sorry?" Anthony said still a little busy staring at her body. It was then Delia told him that she had a feeling inside of her. A feeling that told her she had to done anything he wanted her to do. It was like she was being guided.

Now this was just getting confusing for Anthony. He wanted to know more about the whole situation but at the back of his mind he also knew wanted to some very naughty things with his women.

The question is what does he do?
1152322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Delia Ketchum before you

“I’m fi- what do you mean “master?”

1152322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The whole chocking on an apple had taken Anthony quite a back as he now felt sick and well as trouble breathing.

"Stupid fruit, next time I'm eating a biscuit." Anthony moaned before slowly making his way up to his room again. He had just come home from school and feeling he needed to do something before his parents came home and started to boss him around, he noticed his collection of Tomb Raider games just piled in the corner of his room.

Anthony admits he really did enjoy the tomb raider series it had a great story as well as great puzzles. However like most boy his age he also like the fact he was doing all this as a hot British chick name Lara croft, an athletic woman with brown eyes and reddish-brown hair, frequently kept in a plait or ponytail. Her classic costume is a turquoise sleeveless tank top, light brown shorts, calf-high boots, and long white socks. 12531121.content:
For a while now, you had noticed that your older sister, Sarah, had been wearing more makeup than usual and donning long sleeved shirts in the middle of summer. You were not the only one to notice this, your parents and other siblings had questioned her about it but the response was always the same. "I'm trying a new style, okay?" Your family shrugged it off, not really understanding the 'in thing' with her group but you suspected something sinister was afoot.

Drumming your fingers onto your desk, you muttered, "I have to get into her school and see what's going on but I'll need a girl who can can stay close to her."

Making your decision, you waited for Sarah to leave the house to hang with her friends at the mall and quickly took a number of her clothing. You had borrowed a pair of her panties, bra, socks, a simple dress, and a spare school uniform. Fortunately, no one saw you do this as you returned to your room, locking the door. You laid the clothing out onto your bed before focusing on the oldest girl form the Gunslinger Girl series, Triela. She was a cybernetic assassin who preferred to use her head before her guns, capture not kill, in solving any case. Her high intelligence, vast cybernetic strength, and resistance to pain made her a perfect candidate to help your sister. "She may be a brat." you thought to yourself. "But she is still family."

"Put on these clothes." you ordered her."You will wear the dress today and the school uniform tomorrow."

Triela nodded then proceeded to quickly dress herself. You helped only by zipping the dress closed in the back and tying the white sash in the back. "Now then." you said, facing Triela. "We will now go..."

1351122212.content:
"Oh crap," you cry out. "That seed was nasty. Why did I swallow that seed?"

You toss the apple into the garbage and start to gag. From your mouth, out pops an egg. It cracks open against the tile floor.

Inside the shell is a tiny person all curled up. Slowly she starts to get bigger and bigger until you recognize this girl came out of your thoughts.

"It's Kiki! Hi Kiki!"

You wonder if hearts are shooting out of your eyes as they would in anime and cartoons.

Kiki smiles, "Hi Andrew!" Your heart melts at the sound of her beautiful voice.

Your gaze drops to the floor and you see the broken egg shells on the floor. Immediately Kiki whips out a broom and mop and makes the mess disappear.

Your tummy grumbles and Kiki cooks up a delicious pork chop for lunch.

Something tells you Kiki could do anything faster and better than you.

"Someone pinch me, I'm dreaming." Kiki pinches you. "Ouch!"

1353222111.content:
Anthony's throat still ached as he sat in the corner of his room in the basement. Egg shells littered the floor as the naked goo covered teen bulma walked over to Anthony with a dazed expression. "Excuse me." She began. "But is there anything wrong?"

For a moment, Anthony's mind blanked.

"Master?" Bulma asked. "Is there anything wrong?"

There was a brief moment of shock before Anthony finally recovered enough sense to speak. "A little bit, I guess."

Bulma nodded. "If there's anything you need from me, all you have to do is ask, Master."

"Well..." Anthony began. "I am a little cold. Why don't you try to warm me up."

Bulma nodded with a smile. "Yes Master." She gently nuzzled up against Anthony, pressing her naked body against him, the egg goo finally dry.

The warmth from her body certainly made Anthony feel better. Looking down at her exposed flesh, Anthony dared to brush his fingers against the side of her breast. When she did not protest, Anthony tried cupping his hand around her C cup. Bulma moaned with delight and pressed herself even harder against him, obviously wanting more.

Does Anthony try something more?
1353222111.title: Bulma Time

choices: A confused #18 is standing over you, a giant broken eggshell on the ground
The egg on the dresser has quadrupled in size
13532221121.content:
It's several days since you've been practically bed-ridden. A couple days ago on a dare, you ate this weird fruit and accidentally swallowed one of the seeds. You'd since been feeling the need to vomit several times a day and have so far taken the last week off school, which was a shame, because you've had perfect attendance for the whole year up until now.

Today however, you were feeling particularly off and you had a tickle in your throat that would not go away.

To pass the time at home, you were watching some old episodes of Dragon Ball Z which you hadn't seen in a long time. This particular episode entailed the organic insect creature Cell going after the enchanting Android #18 in order to achieve his perfect form.

You watched the screen as Cell's tail grabbed #18 and began a sucking motion, bringing a sickening feeling to your stomach.

"Man, how was I able to watch this when I was little?" you asked yourself out loud, literally fighting the urge to vomit. You felt something round travel up your throat as you made a run for the toilet.

You positioned yourself over the toilet bowl and readied yourself for the disgusting feeling of regurgitation. "Urg! C'mon!" you urged. Nothing came out however, and the feeling got steadily worse until finally...

*cough*

*plunk*

*splash*

You breathed heavily. The feeling in your throat was gone! And you didn't make a mess in the toilet! But as you peered down into the toilet, you caught sight of something you had never seen before.

"What... the hell... is that?" you panted.

An egg.

It looked slightly bigger than your mouth and you seriously wondered how you were able to keep an egg in your throat for two days.

Normally, you would've flushed it down the toilet with all your other ejected bodily fluids, but this wasn't normal. Without even thinking, you leaned your hand into the toilet and picked up the egg, before running the egg and your hand under some cold soapy water from the bathroom sink. You then gently dried the egg with your sister, Sarah's towel and headed back into your room, feeling particularly drained.

You caught a glimpse of #18 on the screen again. “She'd be pretty hot, if she were real...” you thought to yourself before switching the screen off. You walked over to your dresser and placed the egg on top of it, before climbing into bed and pulling the covers over you.

You were out like a light.

When you woke up...
13532221121.title: Count to 18

choices: Use #18's powers to get revenge on people
Ask #18 whether you can kiss her or do something similar
135322211211.content:
You opened your eyes slowly as you brought your fingers up to wipe the sleep out of your eyes. You moved back with a sudden jolt and hit your head on the wall behind you. You wouldn't normally do this waking up, but the thing was, you were surprised because there was a woman standing naked in your bedroom.

She had sky blue eyes and blonde hair which went down to just above her shoulders. Her breasts were at least a C cup and she had a firm stomach. The woman seemed to be looking at you with a look of both intrigue and confusion on her face.

She looked strikingly familiar. Not familiar as in an old friend, familiar as in someone you've seen before. “Wait a second,” you thought. “She looks just like...”

"Android #18..." you said out loud.

"Yes?" #18 asked, causing you to jump back and hit your head on the wall again. Either this was the real Android #18 (which was very unlikely), a really advanced replica, a cosplayer forgetting their clothes or a really screwed up dream.

You pinched yourself in the arm, but brought your hand away when you felt a sharp pain. You definitely weren't dreaming!

"What's your name?!" you shouted.

"Call me #18." #18 said calmly.

You shook your head. "Okay '#18', what's your story?" you asked, irritated, but also interested to know what was going on.

#18 then spent the next hour explaining to you about herself and her past, which was basically just a long summary of Dragon Ball Z from her point of view. She was able to give in depth information about almost everything concerning herself. This was no cosplayer!

You also discovered that #18 didn't have any memory of what happened after she was absorbed by Cell. "...and now I'm here." #18 finished.

"I see..." you muttered, trying your best to avoid looking at #18's well-endowed chest. "Can you... um... shoot Ki blasts from your hands?" you asked.

#18 nodded. "Watch..." she said calmly as she generated a pink ball of energy in her hands and threw it at one of the egg shells on the ground, causing it to explode. Wait...

...
...
THE EGG?!!?

You looked up at your dresser. The egg was nowhere to be seen and the remaining shell looked to be about the size of #18. This couldn't have something to do with the egg, could it?

"Wow! That's uh... impressive!" you said, now shivering. You were now deadly afraid of this deadly beauty. You remember that in the anime, #18 was able to beat Vegeta, in his Super Saiyan form, to a pulp. And you were no Super Saiyan!

#18 must've noticed your shivering, because she turned to you with a look of concern on her face. "Are you alright?" she asked.

"Y-yeah!" you lied, your whole body now shaking. "Just a bit cold!" you shouted.

#18 smiled at you before leaning down and wrapping her arms around your shoulders in a hug. "Is that better?" #18 asked as you blushed.

You were seriously about to scream. One moment you're sick, the next, one of the hottest and strongest non-Saiyan characters in all of Dragon Ball history is naked in your room with you.

"Yes! Very much so!" you smiled all-too-falsely as #18 began to rub the back of your head with her hand. A thought flashed in your mind of #18 blasting you in the back of the head, killing you easily. This snapped you out of your pleasant thoughts. "Please don't hurt me!" you begged.

"Okay, I won't." #18 smiled as she continued her embrace.

"How can I believe that you won't?" you asked, still fearing the Android.

"You told me not to do something, so I won't do it. Similarly, If you tell me to do something, I will do it, no questions asked." #18 said.

"Anything?" you asked.

"Yes." #18 nodded.

"ANYTHING?!" you asked again. #18 nodded and your mind began to wander. You could do anything with #18 or... TO #18.

Still as the video game an end, Anthony suddenly began to feel like he couldn't breath. He held his throat and tried to get air but he couldn't. It felt like something was stuck in his throat stopping him breathing. It always funny what you remember in a situation like this as it then hit Anthony to force himself to be sick. (Lovely)

So racing to the bathroom and placing his head over the open toilet he forces his finger down the back of his mouth before finally his gag reflects kick in and woosh (Yes that's what noise your sick makes when you vomit,don't question me.)

"Oh man" Anthony groaned. He hated being sick it was the worst feeling ever when you felt like your stomach had just been empty. However looking down into the toilet he was surprised to see no sick. (Like you do) Instead floating in the water was a dark red fist sized egg.

"What the heck?" Anthony thought looking at the bopping egg. He knew school lunches were bad for him but this was just weird. He stood there for a few moments wonder what exactly to do with the egg. He couldn't flush it, it would never go as proven by one family Easter egg hunt early that year.

Still he couldn't just leave it there after all how would he use the toilet with an egg in it. So fishing it out with a few ow ow ow's, he took the egg to his bathroom washed it with hot water in the sink then dried it in a red towel that had been left on the bath. Now at least the egg was clean, our boy wonder now decided to...
135322222222222222112221.title: Red egg angel

choices: A naked Forte (Look it just happens.)
1353222222222222221122212.content:
"Yeah your going in the bin" Anthony said to egg. (Talking to eggs now huh?)

So downstairs he went make sure not to drop the egg, he got to his white front door only to pull on the handle and find it locked. He had forgotten he had locked the front door in case. "Great now where did I put the keys?" Anthony thought, he was always doing this putting his spare front door key down after locking the door then losing it.

Trying to think where his key may have gone, the young teen put the red egg by the door before going off on a hunt for his key. He checked under the sofa, in the fridge, in the cupboards, under the kettle until finally he found it in the fruit bowl on the dinning room table. (Strange things lost keys) Still with the key now found after nearly a twenty minute hunt. Anthony returned to the front door only to be greeted by.....

13532222222222222211222121.content:
It came to quite a surprise to find an anime women standing by his front door. She looked very lost as she gazed around.

"Um..Hhello" Anthony said causing Fiore to face him. She looked at him for a few second before saluting him saying. "Commander Fiore Stollen at your service"
Confused about what to say back Anthony went with, "Ur Anthony um.. School leaver" (Classic writing there)

He expect her to say something but she didn't. Instead she relaxed before finally asking what her orders were?

"I'm sorry orders, what?" Anthony was very confused. First he had a red egg, now a anime girl and the breasts (Stop thinking about them)

He was lost and what he really wanted was answers.

"Um look Fiore.." he said waiting for her to pull a gun on him. "I've got a few questions. One where did you come from? Two where the red egg I had by the door and finally what's up with the whole order thing, your the commander of the angel right?"

Fiore looked at him for a moment before finally answering him.

"I hatched from the red egg you found but as for why you must order me about it is a weird story, but long ago a anime fan created a ball of light filled with information about anime girl and his desires. This ball however never got to be used because the owner died of old age leaving the ball filled with knowledge and desires the ball became a living thing and soon set out to find a new home. And well since I'm here I guess the ball has found a new home in you."


Now usually Anthony would say that was biggest load f rubbish he had ever heard. But being a teenage boy with a pair of breasts so near him, he mere accepted it. (Teenager logic.....)

Still if this story was true then really Anthony could order Fiore to do anything he wanted. But hang on with all something like this there has to be risks after all not all good thing come in safe packages. (Again teenage logic)

The question is does Anthony care?
