1353222222222222222111.content:
After Anthony's near death choking experience, the young man made his way back to his room feeling a little sick. Still climbing onto his bed this did not stop him from flipping his TV over to a show called Totally spies. A show about three women who are spies and kick evil doers butts.

Normally Anthony would deny all knowledge about the show as this was one program his friends thought were uncool. So to keeping himself from being uncool, he never said anything to them. Instead he only watched the show when nobody was around. Still as he watched the show, Anthony couldn't help but admire one of the women named Sam.

She was nineteen, had orange hair, a slim body make up and the personality of a leader. He had always thought that if Sam were real she'd be the perfect girlfriend. However as he settled down again to continue watching, he began to feel a strong pain in his chest before his body started to make his body try to vomit.

He tried to ignore the fact but the pain got worse and worse till finally just as he got up to make a run for the bathroom across his hallway, he vomited.

"Oh yuck." Anthony said thinking about the mess he must have mad.

However after recovering he noticed their was no vomit on the floor instead their was just a light green egg? It looked slightly bigger than his mouth but he wondered what the heck an egg was doing in his throat, he could have swore you ate an apple. Still he didn't stand around for long before the urge to vomit again came.

Anthony this time, raced to bathroom but once again nothing, not even an egg this time. He was beginning to wonder what was going on with him. Yet the young man soon had more to figure out for when he returned to his room he found...
1353222222222222222111.title: Sercet watcher

choices: To stop and try to understand why Sam was here?
To do naughty things with Sam.
13532222222222222221111.content:
Anthony couldn't believe it. He ridded his eye thinking he must be having one of his weird thoughts again but no he saw what he saw. There standing were the egg he coughed up was a standing naked Sam from totally spies and boy was she pretty. She had dark green eyes, long orange free flowing hair that went past her shoulders.

She was thin as she was in the show and well at a guess Anthony guessed her breasts must have been about a c cup. But the real question was what was a character from a show doing in his room?

Wanting to know he called out Sam's name and she turned around without even covering herself causing Anthony to get an eye full causing him to blush.

"Oh hello" Sam said looking at Anthony with a smile. She didn't blush or anything however Anthony blushing as red as a bus asked her if she knew where she was.

The next few minutes he listen to her as she basically explain the plot of the show before saying she couldn't remember anything else only that she was here now with him.

Anthony was still having a hard time believe this after all maybe that apple he had was drugged or something. However he could think straight with Sam standing there naked, his eye kept wondering up and down her body and he felt all happy inside every time he looked at her. He kept trying to think of what he was going to do before Sam spoke again.

"there is one thing?" she said looking at Anthony. He looked at her again trying to control himself before Sam said she felt the urge to do whatever he wanted. At this Anthony gulped trying to hold back himself. Did she really just say that? he thought. He had never thought this would happen to him on his last day of school.

It was then he knew he had to make a choice and in the end he choose....

13532222222222222222222222211221.content:
At first, you though having the house to yourself would be kinda fun, but soon it begins to feel empty. Hauntingly empty. This is punctuated as you pass the door to your little sister's room, Anna. Given how thin the walls were, you could usually hear her talking on the phone, or watching some girly cartoon like Winx Club. You could never see the appeal of that show. Some girly shows like Kim Possible or the new My Little Pony were funny, but Winx Club was a tad too girly for your tastes. Though, you had to admit that some of the girls looked really, really cute, especially that shy, caring, mocha-skinned cutie Flora...

It was then that you became aware of some sticky feeling in your throat. At first, you're able to ignore it, but by the time you reach your room, it's feeling like you're about to choke. In a panic, you hunch to one knee, hacking violently, wanting whatever it was out...

And as swiftly as the painful sensations began, it was gone. "What was that all about?" you wonder aloud as you remain on one knee, breathing heavily. As you slowly open your eyes, you notice something that's definitely not supposed to be there: some sort of egg-sized seed, right underneath you.

As soon as you notice it's there, the seed begins to swell up. Deeply perturbed by this, you crawl backward on all fours, bumping into and shutting your door. The growth of the seed had accelerated so much that by the time that happened, it's just about big enough to house a person. An eerie glow emanates from within, and you think you can SEE the silhouette of a person, too!

Then, to your horror, the layers of the seed peel away in a grotesque fashion. Once the last layer unfolds, what looks like a perfect replica of Flora from Winx Club had she suddenly stepped out into the real world, stands up and looks over to you. Despite your confusion, you can't help but think, Wow, she's way hotter in person than a bunch of ink and lines on a TV screen, soaking up how she looked. She even had on the outfit you preferred most: a pink-and-white floral sundress, with green wedge sandals fastened with pink straps!

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6CK5zB6lLW0/Ts...

"Hello, Anthony," she beckons with an insanely mellifluous voice as she takes a few steps toward you. "How may I serve you, master?"

"M-M-M-Master?" you stammer. "Wait, just who the hell are you, and where the fuck did you come from?" you demand.

Flora lets out a little giggle, then launched into an explanation about your power to create more beings like her via those weird seeds, and that she is the first of your obedient servants.

That certainly offered...possibilities. But for the moment, you're still wrapped up with what was standing before you. You were bored and a bit lonely before... Flora could certainly solve that immediate problem! And given how short Flora's sundress was, and that you were still sitting on the floor, you got a tantalizing peek at her panties. Panties you suddenly wouldn't mind getting into.
13532222222222222222222222211221.title: Flora emerges

choices: A loud banging on Anthony's door.
135322222222222222222222222112211.content:
Gaining a bit more courage, willing to entertain the possibility that this is really happening, you slowly stand up and step towards Flora. She doesn't retreat in the slightest. Was it true what she said? That she was essentially a mindless creature, no free will of her own? That would...kinda take the fun out of everything. "So... you really don't have a mind of your own?" you ask sincerely, cupping Flora's chin. Even that brief contact...you can't help but marvel at her skin's softness. That desire to out-and-out jump the fairy was coming back...

"No mind or free will in the sense you'd normally think of," Flora obediently replied.

Suddenly, you feel a little guilty. This perfectly statuesque, cute girl just standing there, forced to be your obedient servant. You sense of morals is in severe conflict with what's between your legs at the moment. "But since you must obey my commands, can it be possible to...give you some sort of mind, a personality?" you ask as you grab Flora's shoulders. Again, the softness of her silky skin... This time, you can't help but wrap your arms around Flora and pull her close. "I mean, it'd be great to have Flora in my life, but it wouldn't be any good knowing you're just a mindless slave," you admit to her as you hug her close to you. She certainly FEELS real. Body heat radiating from her, the firmness of bones underneath, and... You blush a little as you belatedly realize you planted one hand on her ass, dangerously close to going up Flora's sundress.

Thankfully, Flora doesn't seem to mind the invasion of her personal space, and dutifully answers you query. Having that soft, lovely voice speak so closely into your ear... "You can grant me a personality of my own to a certain degree, but at the end of the day, I still must obey any of your commands. But be careful regarding how much free will you try to give me, because..."

Unfortunately, at that moment, Flora is interrupted by...
135322222222222222222222222112211.title: A desire to embrace Flora takes over.

1353222222222222222222222222222221122222.content:
Anthony had just swallowed the seed when, out of the blue, he thought of Cure Peace from Smile Pretty Cure! Anthony had lusted after her for a short time and had wanted to “have fun” with her. But, there was only one problem: she was not real. However, that was about to change…..

Anthony thought it was weird to think of her at that exact moment, but, he was alone so he went upstairs to pleasure himself. As he started, he felt a pain in his throat. At first, Anthony thought it was no big deal, just a piece of that horrible tasting apple, so he got back into his “fun.”

As he was ready to spill his milk, the pain started to intensify. The pain was like no other. It felt like a steam roller was coming up his throat!

He took his hand out of his pants and started to clutch his throat in pain. He started to upchuck…. And an egg fell out. Anthony was shocked, he had never expected THAT to come out of his throat. Anthony stared, as the egg grew in a fast like motion, until it was about his height. Then, before his eyes, the egg cracked open to reveal… Cure Peace?

Is Cure Peace acting like she has the "real" Cure Peace’s personality or is she just being a mindless drone?

1353222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: C.C.?

1353222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
After settling back down on his bed after the whole flying light ball. Anthony wanting to take his mind off it and so setting up his dvd player, he looked through his collection of anime till he found one he had not watched in quite a while. A program called Code geass.

As he could recall it the anime was pretty dark in place but the story was great. Still as he opened the box and began to put the dvd in the dvd player he noticed the main heroine of the on the front of the box. Her name is C.C an immortal witch with a slim body, long green hair, hazel eye and quite the witty mouth on her.

Still for a witch Anthony thought she was pretty hot. But it was at that thought that suddenly the teen began to feel very unwell. He reached once and tried to get to the bathroom but before he could he puked. However there was no puke instead their on the floor where he had been at the bottom of his bed was a light green egg about the size of his mouth.

"What the?" he had no clue what this was about. but he didn't have time for in a second the egg began to grow to the size of a small women before it cracked open revelling.
1353222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Hatching C.C

choices: Order her to at least get dressed.

1353222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Raven from Teen Titan?

1353222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"What in the world was that weird light?" you mumble to yourself. "Probably just my imagination." You shrug and finish off the rest of the apple you had been eating. Your hunger satisfied, you plop yourself down on the couch and turn on the TV to watch some cartoons.

Flipping through the channels, you stop on an episode of Teen Titans, one of your favorite shows. You especially like the character Raven from that show; she is so dark and mysterious, and you have to admit that you have a bit of a crush on her. As you watch your favorite heroine saving the day on screen, you begin to feel a little bit nauseous, almost as if you were about to upchuck the apple you just ate. But as the seconds tick away, the object working its way up your throat becomes much larger than that apple. You begin to panic, choking on this mysterious object lodged inside your esophagus. Eventually, though, you are able to force the object up and out of your mouth. Spitting it onto the floor, you finally get a chance to examine whatever it is.

"A solid black egg?" you exclaim confusedly. "How did that get inside me? I wonder if it has something to do with that light I saw?"

There's no time for questions, though, as the egg begins growing right before your eyes. You are mesmerized by this mysterious egg as it expands a few inches with each passing second. Once it reaches about three feet in height, you hear a soft crackling sound. The egg must be hatching, you realize. You watch as cracks form along the entire egg, and strangely enough, you can see a bright light showing through the cracks. The glowing light intensifies as more cracks form in the egg and pieces of the shell crumble off, until at last the object inside is revealed to you: none other than your crush, Raven.

The Teen Titan is sitting in a fetal position, the only position that would allow her to fit inside the egg in the first place. She looks just like the character from the cartoon, complete with her signature dark robe, but somehow she is in your living room instead of the TV screen. Her eyes are closed, and she is not moving at all. You wonder if she is even alive.

"Ummm... excuse me..." you call out to her, not really knowing what to say to the newly-hatched Raven. Suddenly, her eyes fly open, and she stands up in the middle of the room.

"My master, your wish is my command," she replies, as if from a script.

"Did... did you just call me master?"

"Yes, my master," Raven repeats. "I am a replica of Raven, brought to life by the power of the Magic Seed you consumed solely to do as you command. Now, what do you wish of me, master?"

You ponder this interesting turn of events for a minute. You have a rare opportunity to do anything you want with your favorite Teen Titans character, and you can barely contain your excitement. But what should you do with her?

He did not know how he was going to explain Erza to them or how he could his summon powers a secret yet he knew he would find a way, he had to or else he might lose everything.

Still shaking such thoughts out of his head, the naked young man get off his bed asking Erza if she liked anything to eat?

"I believe I have had enough of you tonight would you not agree?" She answers quite bluntly making Anthony laugh with embarrassment before he explains he did not mean it in that way he meant like a sandwich or some toast. Erza seems to get the idea asking if the household contained any strawberry cake making Anthony shake his head before adding that he could get some tomorrow but tonight all he could make her is a sandwich or some toast.

"Very well I see. Then I will try one of your sandwiches then Anthony" she answer before quickly covering her mouth. Thinking this as odd of her Anthony asks Erza what's wrong? The red haired warrior of course with a worried look in her eye explains she has failed to ask how she should addresses him as most people like master or sir in this situation. As much as the little pervert in Anthony wanted to give him a complex, the kind young man suggests that she just calls him Anthony and he out of respect should call her by her name Erza.

Erza seem to get this only then to ask her creator if he would like to call her Bitch, whore or slut as she would respond to this as well. To this Anthony quickly shoots these name down telling Erza that those are not name anyone should answer too ever making Erza nod finally getting all her question answered. This little quiz however did leave our young man thinking as he gets dressed back into his old clothes unaware that Erza is watching him the entire time as he is dressing.

The evening from here went on smoothly with Anthony and Erza finally going downstairs to the family kitchen, Erza sits down at the table while Anthony quickly slapped together two sandwiches from whatever is in the family fridge before brining his creations over to the table. Sure a few slices of ham put between two slices of bed may not have been royal eating but the pair do tuck in leading the pair to talk about Anthony power.

"So this their any hidden rules I should know about?" Anthony asks Erza as she carefully bites off a piece of her sandwich. The young man knew nothing in life is for free so there had to be a catch yet to his surprise all Erza gives him is something about how for any sun he summons there must be a moon to follow next. Now this made no sense to the young man, sun, moon he wasn't summoning planets here just hot anime female that he admit is more then happy to tickle his fancy with even so what could this rule mean?

"I believe you are thinking too hard on the matter Anthony." Erza says snapping the young man out of his thoughts."Perhaps it would be better for you to sleep on it. As I find all answers do come to all who seek it."

Wise words indeed if Anthony had not take it out of context making him laughing at his les then funny sexual humour. Still taking her words on board the young man and his partner do this, first washing their plate before doing all their night things such as cleaning teeth which Anthony let Erza use his brush because he'd forgotten about their early experience before finally now in his PJ's Anthony and Erza come to any induction, Sleeping in the same bed.

Although not very roomy the pair did fit however the trouble came from the fact even when in her own nightwear from the show Anthony could not fall asleep feeling her body touch his. He could feel her warmth and frankly he butt rubbed against his lower region making him more stimulated then sleepy as such the young man mind begins to wonder about other anime chicks only to suddenly sit bolt up right and begin to cough like crazy.

The noise wakes Erza up however going to his side, she find a new egg between his leg before suddenly a huge flash blinds them both leaving not a egg in Anthony's lap but...
1353222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Logic should always win!

1353222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Edith Blackwater, the fake nun from the anime black lagoon working really for the CIA. Sitting with her back to him Anthony feels the weight of her well endowed body as she looks back at him with her ocean blue eyes.

"Well I guess it was only a matter of time before you wanted to play with the big gun right Anthony?" Eda commented flicking her long blonde hair at the stunned young man with a smirk on her face. Poor Anthony however did not know how to answer after all sitting on his lap sat one of the most beautiful and scary women from black lagoon anime in her usual attire of a cream miniskirt, a tight pink tank top and pink flip flops.

Such a sight would make any male freeze however for Erza she greets Eda as if they knew each other with a friendly smile making the thirty year old CIA agent laugh before greeting Erza back in her care free manner saying.

"So your were the first one huh Erza. Well guess all men start with small fry first ha ha."

Such a greeting certainly is what Anthony expect from such a women of her past however he did have a few questions for Eda the first being how she knew his name? After all Erza did not call him that first so how come she already knew it? The young got his answer as she turns around putting her large breast against his chest she looks into his eyes answering that the first female summoned by him acts as a example to the rest of the girls he summons later on meaning they already know everything the first female knows. As a point to show this Eda kicks off her flip flops making Anthony see it first hand as the first rule he gave Erza is no shoes on his bed and now even without telling Eda she already knew it.

"Ha I also know your a little lazy when it comes to sex.Typical for an sexual driven young man but perhaps I can teach you how to really make a girl scream."

Eda adds making Anthony mind begin to shoot off at the many ways this hard as nails, gun wielding women could teach him however he looks at Erza feeling a bit of a two face cheater after all he did summon anther women in his life and he wanted to know if he'd upset Erza by doing this. Luckly from him Erza seem to read his mind and without him even asking she answers him back that no such feelings existed in her making the young man happy but also a bit sad that she lack such emotions. He certainly never expected such an answer but the women on his lap certainly made the idea appealing after all he could have two girlfriends and have neither of them get angry at him for sleeping around a twisted man dream but one most men would take without a second chance.

Still the night was still young and with a very sexual active women in his lap what did the young man decide to do in this situation?

1353222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Mirajane Struass

1353222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
After settling back down on your bed after the whole flying light ball event, you were a little confused about the whole thing. After all maybe it was just a firefly? Or Maybe a small light? Either way you decided to try and ignore the event as you were sure it was just tiredness as you had just finished your last day of school and boy was it tough.

Still now you were home alone and with no parents to worry about you decided to lock your front and back door, check all windows were locked and then settled in for an afternoon of watching nothing better then some Anime and the anime you choose to watch was none other then fairy tail.

This show was great in your mind, good characters, lots of action as well as some points that made you want to jump up and cheer and other times cry, however there was one thing you and many other Fairy tail male fan as well as some females could agree with.

Most of the female characters in this anime were made to be fan service and one character which you and many you were sure got that was a women name Mirajane Strauss.

Sweet, beautify, smart and with long sliver hair this character had so many clothing changed which showed off her feminine figure it was no wonder your mind instantly thought about her as you picked up the DVD box set you had from you room. However, it was then you suddenly found it hard to breath.

"What the,," you said dropping the box set as you held your neck. It felt like your were choke and rushing to the bathroom to get a drink from the sink, you only turned the tap on when suddenly you throw up.

"Oh man" you said finally happy to breath again. However as you looked into the sink as we all do tend to do when we're sick you didn't see any sick. In fact, all you saw was a pink egg a little bigger then your mouth sitting under the running tap water.

Now this really was freaky to you. You coughed up an pink egg? Now usually you would simply take this egg and throw it in the bin as well, eggs are not meant to be pink. However being curious you take the egg out the water and trying it with one of the towel in your bathroom. You carefully then carried the egg back to your room.

Now like most eggs you thought that if this egg was going to hatch you guessed it had to be warm, so wrapping it in your clothes pile your mum ironed yesterday you made a funny look nest with the egg inside. Now you always knew someone had to sit on the egg however you weren't feeling very bird mommy you decided a hot water bottle would be good enough. So rushing downstairs to your kitchen you begin to boil your house kettle to prepare the water.

Yet while this was going on the egg itself started to crack and as you came rushing back up stairs a few minutes later with a boiling hit water bottle wrapped in a towel, you enter your room only to see Mirajane standing on the pile of clothes where the egg was.

Dressed in her usual clothing when she works in the bar, she stood there until you said hi which caused her to....
1353222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Meeting Mirajane Strauss

1353222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
“Ah Sia, or should I say Lisianthus”. Anthony thought to himself as he pleasured himself, “if only you were real….” Our hero thought as he reached his climax. “Uh, I’m dying,” Anthony thought as he started to choke on something coming up his thought. “This is it, goodbye cruel world.” Our hero said as he wished silently as the egg fell on the ground and he fell in to unconsciousness.



Sia, whom had just arrived in her master’s world, was for the most part happy. She wanted to please him in any way she could. Her only complaint was that her master was not awake. So, being Sia, she woke him up with a nice hit in the head with a chair.

“Oh man, I thought I almost died!” Anthony said groggily as he stared around his room in disbelief, thee, in the center of his room was Sia, wearing…

1353222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"Master..."

"..."

"Master, please wake up..."

You drearily opened your eyes at the sound of a calm feminine voice calling you her master. Your eyes widened when you saw none other than Goemon Hachisuka from Oda Nobuna no Yabou staring down at you.

"What the hell? I must be dreaming..." you muttered.

"No, Master. This is not a dream." Goemon insisted. "You brought me into this world. I came from the egg to serve you."

Goemon's simple remark triggered something in the back of your mind. It all started coming back to you. A couple days ago, you had gone up to the shops alone to get your brother Andy some food. You were very reluctant to go on your own. It wasn't that going up to the shops was scary, but there was always some homeless man, conspiracy theorist or escaped mental patient standing near the entrance of the shops that you couldn't avoid talking to or even making eye contact with.

And this day seemed no different.

Out of the corner of your eyes, you caught a glimpse of a rather scruffy-looking older man who wore a damp tweed jacket with an un-matching pair of socks. "Hey, kid!" the man shouted, causing you to turn to him.

"Sorry, I don't have any spare change." you said whilst continuing on your way. You stopped when the man put his gloved hand around your arm.

"You misinterpret me, Anthony." the man said, causing you to do a spit-take.

"What the fuck?! Since when do homeless people use the word 'misinterpret'? And how does this one know my name?" you thought.

"I know what you're thinking," the man smirked. "How does some random homeless man know my name?" he laughed. "Trust me, I'm not homeless. I'm only dressed like this because I don't want to ruin my other clothes. I've been watching you for sometime..."

"That's a little creepy..." you muttered.

The man blushed once he realized what he just said. "No, I didn't mean it like that!" he insisted.

"Yep-okay-sure." you said quickly, but stopped as the man put what seemed to be a purple apple in your hand.

"What the hell is this?" you asked bluntly.

"Every boy has fantasies. If you eat this, they will become a reality. I guarantee it." the man grinned, before turning and walking away, leaving you stunned.

Later that same day, you were unsure on whether or not you were going to eat the schizoid fruit. But eventually, under the influence of a lot of free time, you decided to eat it.

In retrospect, eating a fruit given to you by a complete stranger didn't seem like a sensible thing to do, but his talk of you fulfilling all of your fantasies intrigued you beyond belief. You picked up the fruit and eyed it cautiously, before sinking your teeth into it and breaking some off into your mouth, which is where things got even more weird than they had been.

You had accidentally swallowed one of the seeds during your careless gorging, which you didn't think anything of at the time, but you later began to feel a slight discomfort whenever you swallowed, which soon turned into a raging disorientation. You felt something growing in the back of your throat and knew that whatever it was, had to come out.

It was at this time that you were watching an episode of Oda Nobuna no Yabou in your dimly-lit room. As Goemon appeared on the screen, your body couldn't take it anymore. The bad news was that you didn't end up making it to the toilet, but the good news was that you didn't end up making as big a mess on your bedroom carpet as you thought you would have.

In the middle of your purple-tinted regurgitation (which was already plenty weird on its own), you caught sight of an egg. The egg was a little smaller than a tennis ball, and you wondered how such a thing was able to come out of your mouth without choking you to death. Your memory after that event turned hazy and the next thing you remembered was that Goemon was still looking down at you, a hand outstretched to help you to your feet as you were lost in your thoughts.

"Are you okay, Master?" Goemon asked as your focus returned to the present.

"Uhmm... yeah..." you trailed off, accepting Goemon's gesture as you got to your feet.

"Okay. Do you have duty or task which you would like me to perform for you, Master?" Goemon asked.

"I'm sorry, what?" you asked.

“Can you just cut to the chase?” Tekki asked.

You groaned, pulling Tekki by his wrist inside your house, and then up to your room. You quickly opened the door, pushed him in and closed the door behind the both of you. Tekki’s eyes widened as he saw both Goemon and Inuchiyo in your room. Tekki wasn’t one to watch Oda Nobuna no Yabou religiously like you, but he knew who both of these girls were due to the occasional episode he watched in your company.

“Anthony... Are they who I think they are?” Tekki asked, his eyes wide with surprise as he looked at the pint-sized females who were in his best pal’s room.


“Ye-”


“Wow... this is heavy...” Tekki muttered as he started to faint in the middle of the room. You rolled your eyes and eased Tekki back to his feet.

“You alright?” you asked.

“But this is...? How can...? They’re not even...” Tekki rambled.

“Okay. Calm down, buddy.” you sighed.

“Master, who is this?” Goemon asked softly.

“Girls, this is my best friend, Tekki.” you explained, motioning to your friend.

“Uhhhh.... They’re speaking Japanese, right?” Tekki asked, trying to wrap his mind around what his eyes were showing him. You nodded. “Well then... Ohaiyogozaimasu...” he muttered, using what he had learned on the Japanese language from Japanese class at school, and saying good morning to the girls.

“Good morning to you, Tekki-kun. A friend of Anthony’s is a friend of mine!” Goemon smiled. She then nudged Inuchiyo, who was silent, to get her to speak up and say hello.

“Yeah... Hi...” Inuchiyo sighed.

Although Tekki, with is mind still racing, trying to deal with the fact that his best friend had two fictional characters in his room, only got the gist of what the girls had said, he understood enough. Tekki nodded and turned back to you. “How did this even happen?” he asked.

“Apparently it involved a homeless man and some magic fruit....” Andy mumbled.

“Are you serious?” Tekki asked.

“Well, that’s one way of putting it... but yeah, that’s basically it.” you chuckled.

“Alright, I don’t wanna even get into the specifics of how this all happened, but what exactly is the reason you called me over here?” Tekki asked.

“Look, would it be alright if you took the day off school and stayed at your place taking care of the girls?” you asked.

“Uhh...” Tekki pretended to ponder your question. “No.”

“Why not?!”

“Well, mom says I’m not allowed to have people over without permission because the last time that happened, SOMEONE spilt mustard on the carpet! And plus, it’s a SCHOOL day!”

“I told you, that was an accident!” you protested. “And it isn't even a real school day. It’s the last day! Graduation’s over! Do you know what that even means? We’ll probably be doing nothing but dick around in class!”

“Dude, I've never missed a day of school in my life! My grades are perfect and if I miss a day of school, I’ll no longer have perfect attendance!”

“Who cares? You said it yourself, All A++’s! Attendance doesn't mean jack! And you told me that your parents aren't even home at the moment! They won’t have to know!”

“Dude... I dunno...”

“Well I can’t take them to school! And my sisters might wake up soon!” you protested. Tekki sighed, and you added “Please... It’s just for one day...” in pleading tone. You knew that when it came down to it, Tekki would do whatever he could to help you out.

“Okay... fine... I’ll look after them. Come by my house after school.” Tekki said, rather dejectedly.

“Thank you so much!” you sighed with relief. “Girls...” you said turning to them. “Tekki is going to look after you until after school. I want you to show him the same respect that you two have shown me, okay?”

“You mean without the sex, right?” Inuchiyo said bluntly.

“I-Inuchiyo!” Goemon shouted, her cheeks reddening.

“You know, it’s a good thing he wasn't taught that word at school...” you muttered, thankful that Tekki wasn't able to understand what Inuchiyo had said. “Yeah, but no. Don’t do that with him.”

“Do what now?” Tekki asked.

“Nothing!”

“Well... what am I supposed to do?” Andy piped up. You sighed, having completely forgotten about him.

“Okay. Your job is very simple. I want you... to keep your mouth shut about this. Under no circumstances are you to tell your friends about any of this!”

“Alright, alright, chill.” Andy sighed.

“We all good? We all know what we have to do?” you asked.

“Yes!” everyone besides you answered.

“Awesome! Let’s do it!”
1353222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The Mustard Incident

choices: ...we could figure out this stuff works..."
...we shouldn't touch anything. Tekki did tell us not to..."
1353222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
While you got ready for school and Andy headed back into his room to do the same, Tekki, Goemon and Inuchiyo exited your room and quietly headed for the front door. Unfortunately, Tekki had to redirect the attention of the girls a couple times, as they became fascinated with pretty much everything they saw. No harm was done though, as the three eventually made it out the door without a hassle.

“Wow...” the girls mumbled, both of them taken aback by the suburban environment they had suddenly found themselves in. Both being fictional characters from a land based on Japan in the 1500’s meant that they had never experienced modern civilization, let alone Western civilization. Tekki watched with a smile as the eyes of the girls drifted from the cars, to the streetlights, and even to the cracks in the pavement.

“The inside is much different to the outside...” Goemon muttered.

“We should probably get going...” Tekki said to the girls, struggling to keep up with Goemon’s talking despite her rather cute speech impediment. Both Goemon and Inuchiyo nodded, and followed Tekki to his house.

Thankfully, Tekki’s house was just down the street from yours, which meant they didn't have to cross the road at all. It would have been rather difficult to explain the rules of traffic, even minute traffic, to two people who came from a completely different era in time and had never seen the kind of transportation that was prevalent in this era in time.

Both Goemon’s and Inuchiyo’s eyes shifted from one thing to another as they followed Tekki closely to his house. It was as if the girls were constantly on edge, but considering where they came from, no one could really blame them. Tekki stopped at the front door of a two-story house, before crouching down and lifting up the welcome mat to reveal a spare key to his house. Tekki put the key in the lock and turned the key to unlock the door, pulling it back.

“After you.” Tekki motioned to the girls, who shot confused glances between them. Goemon cautiously took a step through the door and then waited for Inuchiyo. Tekki sighed. “Okay, how about I go first then?”

Both Goemon and Inuchiyo allowed Tekki to lead them into his house, their eyes darting around as their minds took note of all of the strange contraptions littered around the hallway, dining room and kitchen.

“Would either of you like anything to drink?” Tekki asked, trying to be a gracious host.

Inuchiyo turned to Goemon and whispered to her a question, “Do we have to drink?”

“I’m not sure.” Goemon answered plainly. “I haven’t really felt the need to.”

“Right...” Inuchiyo slyly said. “You haven’t felt the need to drink, but you felt the need to fornicate with Master Anthony.”

Goemon stamped her foot on the ground. “Inuchiyo!” she shouted.

“Yeah... I can just close this...” Tekki piped up, pointing to the refrigerator door he was holding open.

“Where exactly does that door lead to?” Inuchiyo asked.

“This door doesn't lead to anywhere.” Tekki murmured. “It’s a refrigerator.”

Both Goemon and Inuchiyo looked at each other with confused looks on their faces. “Inuchiyo, do you know what a refrigerator is?” Goemon asked.

“No idea. I think this kid might be making up words to trick us.” Inuchiyo pondered.

Goemon gasped. “No! Master Anthony would never palm us off to someone who would trick us like that!”

Tekki cleared his throat, redirecting the attention of the two girls to him. “Would you like a drink? I’m kinda letting the cold air escape by keeping the door open...”

“What does this ‘refrigerator’ do?” Inuchiyo asked.

“It keeps things cool.” Tekki explained in the easiest possible. “Now, would you like something to drink or not?”

Geomon and Inuchiyo shrugged to each other before Goemon answered. “Yes please.”

“Okay, what would you like?” Tekki asked.

“You mean you have other drinks besides water?” Inuchiyo asked.

Tekki sighed, rubbing his temples with his fingers. “We’re still on about the fridge. How am I gonna explain to them what half of the stuff I've got here is?” he mumbled. “Yes, but look. Here’s water, okay?” Tekki took out a bottle of water from the fridge, turned to the cupboard, took out two cups and poured water into each, before handing it to the girls.

Both girls took a sip, before tipping the cups up and drinking all of the water. Goemon gave the cup back to Tekki, who put it in the sink. “Thank you, Tekki. The water tastes different cold, but I like it.” Goemon said.

Tekki smiled, turning to Inuchiyo. “Do you like it, Inuchiyo?”

“Yes.” Inuchiyo answered bluntly, handing Tekki her cup, which Tekki also put in the sink.

“Okay. Would the both of you follow me to my room?” Tekki asked. Goemon and Inuchiyo nodded as Tekki led them up a spiral staircase to another hallway with several sets of closed doors. “My room’s in here.” Tekki motioned, turning the doorknob and opening the door.

“Wow...” both girls looked around the room, their eyes temporarily fixing in on Tekki’s bed, closet, television, computer and desk, of which there were multiple trinkets and items of interest. Of course, neither Goemon nor Inuchiyo had any idea what half the stuff in the room even was.

“What’s that?” Inuchiyo asked, pointing to Tekki’s TV.

“That’s a television.” Tekki explained, not wanting to go any further at the risk of confusing the girls.

“What’s a ‘television’?” Goemon asked.

“Umm...” Tekki searched his brain for a simple way to explain what a television was, but came up empty. “If you really wanna know, you could Google the answer, or ask Anthony when he comes by to get you in the afternoon.”

“What’s ‘Google’?” Inuchiyo asked.

“Google...” Tekki paused. “Is something you can access with a computer.”

“What is a ‘computer’?” Goemon asked.

“That thing.” Tekki said, pointing to his computer setup on his desk. “Look, I’m sure Anthony will be happy to answer whatever questions you have. Now, I didn't actually get a chance to finish eating my breakfast since Anthony called me over to his place, so I’ll be back in a moment. I trust that you two won’t touch anything that you’re not supposed to?”

Both girls nodded, but shot each other hidden glances. “Okay. If you need me, come downstairs.” Tekki said, walking out of his room and closing the door, the sound of his footsteps receding down the spiral staircase.

Goemon and Inuchiyo were initially silent, content with looking at everything in Tekki’s room. “Inuchiyo, what should we do?” Goemon eventually asked.

Inuchiyo shrugged. “Well, I guess...
1353222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The Tekki Problem

1353222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
“Well, I guess we could try and figure out how some of this stuff works...” Inuchiyo suggested, taking a look around at all of the equipment that Tekki had in his room.

“Are you sure that’s a good idea?” Goemon asked.

“Goemon, what’s the worst that could happen?”

“Probably a lot! I don’t know how any of this stuff works!” Goemon protested.

“Nothing can go wrong. Trust me.”

“If you say so.” Goemon sighed. “What should we try first?”

“How about, you try figuring out that thing.” Inuchiyo said, pointing to the computer. “And I’ll try and figure out this thing...” Inuchiyo murmured, motioning towards the TV.

“Okay!” Goemon shouted, her excitement noticeable as she rushed over to the computer monitor. Goemon slowly ran her fingers along the monitor, leaving fingerprints as she trailed her fingers around the screen. “Nothing’s happening, Inuchiyo!”

"Keep trying!" Inuchiyo shouted, growing irritated that her constant tapping of the screen had no effect. Her curiosity piqued when she noticed the frame. It was black, but reflective. Running her fingers along the side and then to the back of the screen, her fingers bounced between the wires and cables. After several minutes, Inuchiyo huffed, "Nothing's working, Goemon. I give up!" and pouted, walking over and planting her backside down on the edge of Tekki's bed.

The television screen sprang to life as an image appeared on it. The sudden burst of sound from the speakers gave both Goemon and Inuchiyo a fright, Inuchiyo jumping off the bed and Goemon falling backwards.

“Welcome back to the DIY Network.” A voice broke through the speakers as a man appeared on the screen who was shown to be standing in the living room of a well-decorated house. “Now, what we've got here is an example of fully installed laminate flooring which I’ll show you how to get started on in just a minute.” The screen then showed a close up of laminate flooring as Goemon and Inuchiyo looked at the screen completely dumbstruck.

“Inuchiyo, what’s going on?” Goemon asked.

“I’m not sure...” Inuchiyo muttered as the man on the screen continued to ramble on about the different types of flooring found in the average American home. Inuchiyo squirmed on the bed. “I think I’m sitting on something.” Inuchiyo whispered, getting up off the bed and looking to where she was sitting. Sure enough, she had been sitting on the television remote. Inuchiyo picked it up and looked at it. “What could this be?” she murmured.

After a moment’s hesitance, Inuchiyo pressed a button on the remote, causing the images on screen and the sound that was coming through the speakers to temporarily stop, and then change to something completely different. The screen now showed two people in a mansion, who seemed to be in a heated argument, while the sound coming through the speakers was a somber-sounding orchestral composition of music mixed with the two people’s words. “How could you have an affair with Janice?” the woman shouted.

“Look, baby. I’m sorry.” The man said defensively. “It was after I got drunk. It just sort of happened!”

“What about our baby? She deserves better than this!”

“Hey, Goemon.” Inuchiyo called out, causing Goemon to turn to her.

“Yeah?”

“I think whenever I touch this thing, I can change what happens on that thing.” Inuchiyo said, pointing to the TV.

“Tekki said that it was called a ‘television’.” Goemon noted.

“Yeah, whatever!”

“See if you can get something else.” Goemon said. “Maybe there’s something we can watch that’s in our language.”

Inuchiyo nodded, pressing another button on the remote as the images on screen and the sound that was coming through the speakers temporarily stopped once again, this time starting up to show a young couple in a dimly lit bedroom, almost completely naked, sucking on each other’s faces and humping each other. “Oh! Oh, God! Yes! Harder!” a young attractive woman screamed, her voice dripping with ecstasy.

“Hey, that’s like what me and Master Anthony were doing.” Goemon said nonchalantly. “And that sounds almost exactly like what Andy said while I gave him a handjob.”

“So you had sex with our Master AND gave his brother a handjob?” Inuchiyo asked.

“Anthony asked me to.” Goemon said, seemingly mesmerized by the events occurring on the screen. She let out a soft-sounding gasp as she blushed. “Inuchiyo, I feel funny!”

“What do you mean? Are you sick?” Inuchiyo asked.

“No... I feel so... good... Like when Master and I...” Goemon subconsciously reached down and slipped one of her soft, dainty hands past her top, through her leggings and into her nether regions. “Ohhh!”

“Goemon, stop that!” Inuchiyo ordered.

“N-no!” Goemon gasped as she continued to pleasure herself, much to Inuchiyo’s chagrin.

“Fine then!” Inuchiyo yelled, pressing another button on the remote, switching it back to the DIY Network.

“Ch-change it back!” Goemon growled.

“No!”

“Then give me that!” Goemon said, retracting her hand from her nether regions, tidying herself, and then standing up.

“No! You can’t just pleasure yourself in someone else’s home.”

"Give. Me. That. Thing." Goemon said sternly, completely overtaken by her sexual urges. Inuchiyo shook her head as if to say ‘no’, and Goemon’s eyes narrowed. The way she felt now, it reminded her so much of when you, her Master, engaged in the act of intercourse. She had never felt as alive as she did during that moment. The way your lips touched, the sound of your voice, it was all music to Goemon's ears. Without you around, Goemon couldn't cope. She needed release, and Inuchiyo was standing in her way. In a flash, Goemon charged at Inuchiyo, knocking her to the ground and grabbing the remote out of her hands.

Inuchiyo grunted, twisting around and tripping Goemon up as she fumbled with the remote. Goemon stumbled forward and retrieved a throwing knife from her clothing, before throwing it with precision at Inuchiyo, who barely dodged in time. “What the hell?!” Inuchiyo shouted. “Are you trying to kill me?”

“J-just give me the device! I need this!” Goemon stammered.

“Not if you’re going to try and kill me for it!” Inuchiyo asserted, now clutching her spear tightly in her hand.

Goemon twitched, before once again charging at Inuchiyo. Inuchiyo turned and threw the remote away from both her and Goemon. Unfortunately, the remote ended up flying straight through the monitor of Tekki’s computer. The television turned itself off and an eerie silence filled the room.

“Look what you made me do!” Inuchiyo shouted.

“What? How was that MY fault?! YOU should have just given it to me!”

“If I did that, you’d be facing the television, on your back, and leaking on the floor!”

“Yeah, okay! But what about Tekki?”

“What about Tekki?” Inuchiyo asked.

“WHAT ABOUT TEKKI?! HE TOLD US NOT TO TOUCH ANYTHING WE WEREN’T SUPPOSED TO! I KNEW WE WEREN’T SUPPOSED TO TOUCH THE TELEVISION! NOW THE COMPUTER’S BROKEN!”

“HE WON’T HAVE TO KNOW, OKAY?! JUST CALM DOWN, GOEMON! CALM DOWN!” Inuchiyo yelled.

“STOP YELLING AT ME!” Goemon protested.

Unfortunately for the girls, Tekki heard all of the screaming, and rushed back up to his room to see what the problem was. He certainly wasn't expecting to see his computer trashed.
1353222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Channel Surfing

choices: “I've thought of another way you girls can make it up to me...”
“I think you girls should clean yourselves up a little...”
1353222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
“Hey! What’s all the screaming about?” Tekki asked as he entered the room, his eyes widening as he caught sight of his busted monitor. “Aw FUCK!!!” Tekki yelled. This time, he swore in English, so neither Goemon nor Inuchiyo could understand him, but the girls could tell just by his tone that he was NOT happy. “What the Hell happened here, huh?!” Tekki asked, this time in Japanese. While Inuchiyo had a sad expression on her face, Goemon looked like she was almost in tears. “What happened?!” Tekki repeated, now hoarse with rage, just as Goemon burst into tears.

“I-I’m so sorry!” Goemon wailed. “Inuchiyo and I were fighting over the control of the television and Inuchiyo threw the controller through the computer!”

“Sure, blame me!” Inuchiyo huffed. “The reason we were fighting was because Goemon was fingering herself to something that was on the television!”

“WHAT?!?” Tekki shouted.

“Yeah! She was watching two people who were naked and then she put her finger in her-”

“Sh-shut up!” Goemon sniffed. “It was your idea to fool around with the television and computer in the first place!”

Tekki groaned, slumping to his knees as he clutched both sides of his head in grief. “Damn it! I trusted you both to not touch anything! And you both do EXACTLY what I told you NOT to do!”

“I sincerely apologize, Tekki-san.” Inuchiyo said, getting down on bended knee. “As General of the Oda Faction, I should know better than to fight amongst my own people and damage another’s personal belongings. I humbly ask for your forgiveness.”

“Wow... I didn't expect you to say something like that, Inuchiyo...” Tekki said, surprised by Inuchiyo’s apology.

“Inuchiyo’s weird now...” Goemon muttered, wiping her tears away before raising her voice. “A-and I-I’m sorry too, Tekki! Please forgive me as well!”

Tekki sighed. “Can the both of you show me what you did to the computer?” he asked. Goemon and Inuchiyo nodded almost instantly and walked with Tekki over to where his computer was, the monitor now cracked and broken, a black liquid leaking out the front.

“That! See?” Goemon pointed to the broken monitor, her voice wavering.

“Hmm..? Well that’s less of a problem if all that’s broken is the monitor.” Tekki said.

“What do you mean?” Inuchiyo asked.

“I raged ‘cause I thought you girls broke the computer. It was just the monitor. Don’t you guys worry, I can easily get a new one. Of course, Anthony’ll have to pay for it.” Tekki explained.

“What ‘monitor’?” Goemon asked.

Tekki groaned once more, forgetting that the girls didn't have a very good sense of Western technologies. “You know what? Ask Anthony when he comes to pick you both up...” Unfortunately for Tekki though, that wouldn't be for a number of hours. “I’ll go and something to clean up this mess, okay? Don’t touch anything!” Tekki ordered as he went back downstairs.

“Okay, Goemon. THIS time, we’d better do what he says!” Inuchiyo cautioned. She glanced over at Goemon, who was gazing down at the floor, a solemn look on her face.

“Inuchiyo...” Goemon whispered.

“Yeah?”

“I’m sorry about before, I don’t know what came over me. Are we still friends?”

“Of course we are, you doof!” Inuchiyo smirked, bopping Goemon on the head.

“Hey!” Goemon twitched. A few seconds passed and Goemon leant over and embraced Inuchiyo in a sororal fashion. Inuchiyo, after a moment of hesitance, returned the hug.

The rush of footsteps was heard as Tekki stumbled up the staircase, a damp flannel in his hand. “This’ll have to do for now. I don’t know where my mom keeps the-” Tekki stopped and smiled as he saw the scene unfold in front of him. When the girls pulled away from each other, Tekki realized that he might’ve been too hard on the girls. “I’m sorry I yelled at you two before. I’d have probably done the same thing if I was in your situation.” Tekki then thought about making you pay for a new monitor. In the back of his mind, Tekki knew that he was more to blame then you were. After all, he did say that he would look after the girls for you, and leaving them in a room with gadgets they had never seen before, in a house they had never seen before, in a world they had been to before was just asking for trouble. He could also see by the look on Goemon’s face that she was still a little shaken by the events that had transpired. The least he could do was ease her concerns.

“Don’t mention any of this to Anthony, alright? He’s already got enough on his plate to deal with right now, so making him pay for a several hundred dollar monitor would just be adding to his strife.”

“A-are you-” Goemon began.

Tekki raised his hand. “Seriously, it’s alright. I’ll just tell my mom I got angry playing World of Warcraft or something.”

“Th-thank you very much, Tekki-san!” Goemon shouted, rushing over and giving Tekki a hug.

Tekki blushed profusely. “Whoa, whoa! Okay! There, there...” Tekki patted Goemon lightly on the back, feeling a little uncomfortable by how close she was. Goemon eased herself away from Tekki as he turned and walked over to the monitor, taking the television remote out of the busted screen and chucking it in the bin. He then began to wipe up the mess that the girls had inadvertently created.

“Tekki-san, is there any way we can assist you with cleaning up?” Inuchiyo asked.

“You say that Goemon was fingering herself before?” Tekki enquired. Inuchiyo nodded while Goemon blushed. “Can the both of you go downstairs and head to the third door on the left? I’ll meet you there in a second.”

“Sure...” Inuchiyo mumbled, unsure of why Tekki was asking them to go downstairs when they had made such a mess upstairs. “C’mon, Goemon.” Inuchiyo grabbed Goemon’s wrist and pulled her along with her.

“Both these girls are acting so out-of-character...” Tekki thought as he went back to cleaning up the mess. “I’d better at least tell Anthony about that when he gets here...”

When Tekki had finished cleaning up the mess, he went downstairs to throw away the flannel and chuck the monitor in the trash outside. He returned to the house, before heading to the shower room where Inuchiyo and Goemon were waiting for him. “Good, you girls found it okay.” Tekki said as he walked in, the girls turning to him, both with looks of curiosity on their faces.

“This room looks nice, but why did you make us come here, Tekki-san?” Goemon asked, her voice echoing in the room.

“Well...” Tekki began.

14533222222222222222222222222222222221.title: Wonder Woman?

145332222222222222222222222222222222211.content:
"Dude! Block then uppercut! Block then uppercut! It's like you've never fought before!" Tekki's voice yelled out at you from over the microphone. You had to try your best to ignore him and focus on the match. There was no way you were going to take another L to her. You could hear her incessant laughter in your head as she beat you something unmerciful.

"Tek! Tag out." Hitting the Left Bumper on your controller you watched as Sub-Zero slid out of the screen and was replaced by Kenshi. Resting your controller on your lap you reached down and grabbed your soda. A quick sip followed by a cough and a loud throat clear. "Tekki man.. I still have this feeling in the back of my throat.. it's been like half a day already and I can't get rid of it... I think I might have a problem." There was no response over the mic as Tekki was being destroyed. It was almost painful to see him being hurt like that.. he hadn't gotten a single hit on her yet, but you couldn't really judge. You only got one hit on her as well.

"Anthony, It's time for war!" The tone in his voice was unmistakable, he was going for some sort of hackneyed plan that would either win you the whole shebang.. or add another L to your repertoire. You just had to smile as you unconsciously took a tight hold of your controller.

"I'm right behind you, Tek. Hurt her." You could almost sense the smile on his face as he tagged you back into the fight, right in the middle of her combo. You let off a mean X-Ray attack and brought her health down low. The rest of the game was a huge turnaround. You managed to win the fight with about 3% of your health left. You and Tek were screaming and cheering the whole time as Brianna's voice came back into the fold.

"Oh Tekki... Anthony. I can't believe I even dared to challenge you. You're obviously the better fighters. I'm packing up my controller and heading over to your house now.. to give you your.. reward." When she spoke it was like pillow talk. Like she was about to take off her top and go to town on who ever was in the room. Of course that was all part of the wager but it didn't change the fact that it sounded sexy.

"Alright man. I'm gonna head down to the Comic Store real quick then I'll be over. I wonder what she has in store for us." With a laugh his voice left the fold as they both signed off. Turning off your Xbox you leaned back in your chair and thought about comics. Feeling your pocket vibrate you pulled out your phone and took a look at who it was. You had one missed text from your mom about their being money on the table for dinner, and one from Tek asking about which comic you'd like from the store. You picked up your can of soda and rested the edge of the can in your teeth as you replied to Tek. 'Pick me up Wonder Woman and Superman, I'll pay you back when you get here.' As the message was off you tossed your phone on your bed and leaned back in your chair, trying to finish your soda.

It would've been a calm moment but as luck would have it, this day wasn't going to be calm for you. A loud bang came from outside your window which startled the ever living mess out of you. You jumped in your chair and it lost balance, sending you tumbling to the floor. Some soda went down the wrong pike and you were left choking and gasping on the floor. Rolling over you started beating your chest trying to get some normal breathing together. Now this is where things got crazy. There was this massive burning feeling in your throat. Your eyes started watering as you felt the feeling moving up to your mouth. In one last heave your pain was relieved as an off white egg flew from your mouth. It soared through the air for a minute before landing in the middle of your carpet. Turning towards your window and wiping your eyes you tried to see what was happening outside but the real situation was happening behind you.

The egg began shaking and growing to unimaginable proportions. After a few seconds the egg was big enough to hold a full sized human in it. Erupting from the egg was a 5'11 black haired, beautiful amazon with golden accessories and a glowing lasso. Shutting your window you suck your teeth and turn around, catching a full view of Diana standing before you. Speechless wasn't even the right word for you right now. You didn't move, didn't flinch.. you didn't even have the sense to drop your jaw.

"Hello, Anthony. I hope you don't mind me saying... but good first choice." She spoke with a smile on her face before crossing her arms and just watching you. Of course there was only one way to handle this situation.

info.brief_description: The concept idea was made by Starfighter364
info.description:
You are a boy named Anthony. One day you accidentally swallow a magic seed, soon after you think about a fictional girl and you somehow spit out an egg that is slightly bigger than your mouth, the soon grows to a size that could contain the girl you thought about, hatches into the girl, but without a mind or free will, she has all of the original's memories, and is your obedient servant. Now you can spit out an egg of a fictional girl the same way whenever you want to, but it will hurt your throat, so you can't do it too many times in a short period of time. Because of the seed, you can also now turn into liquid, and enter a girl's body through any opening in her body, if it is a girl who isn't your servant, then she will become just like one of your fictional girl servants if you want her to.

You can control any of your fictional girl servants with your mind, make them be living puppets or living dolls, make them living robots, transfer your spirit into one of their bodies, physically enter their bodies and take over them in several ways, make them say anything you want them to by thinking it, and make a personality for them that you can change or take away at any time. You can undo anything that I mentioned above any time you want.

Rules:


Keep any names of characters the same throughout the story.

No killing off Anthony or ending the story.

You can only do the things I mentioned about with girls, not boys.


Only Anthony can gain these abilities.

Use proper grammar and spelling.

If I find out that someone who adds has stolen someone else's chapter, and then posted it as their own, then I'll delete it.

Characters who can transform between girl forms and boy forms will be in girl form the whole time, with no traces of the boy form.

If there is ever a debate on the gender of a character, then ask me, and I'll decide. Characters that are counted as female:
Haku (There is no way that Haku is a boy in my opinion, for several reasons).
Vivian (In the English version of Paper Mario the Thousand Year Door it is true without a doubt, and by what I understand, the info in the journal about the characters in the Japanese version comes from Mario's point of view, and since Beldam calls Vivian a man during an insult, Mario could quite possibly only believe it to be true).

Any character who in their series is called a god will be considered a powerful spirit instead in this story.

You can have Anthony know about any series you want, or not know about a series.

If there is a character who doesn't have a specific gender, you may create a female version just like you can create a girl who is naturally female.

Please put up a picture of the fictional girls during the option chapter they appear in. (I'll do my best to edit the chapters already up to include images). Don't hesitate to use pictures of what the replica (or Anthony possessing the replica) is doing.

There may be other things I'm forgetting, so everything else is fair game unless I remember anything else and add it.

In my version I will allow Rule 63 to take effect. If you do not know what Rule 63 is, look here…http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/RuleSixtyThree

Anthony's personality: In my version, I will let you make Anthony's personality be anything you want.


Anthony's appearance: Tall, with dark brown hair and dark brown eyes. Wears dark blue jeans or shorts, black shoes, with the shirts he wears being either completely dark blue, completely yellow, completely red, very dark blue with the word Nintendo written on the front, or black with a picture of Sonic on the front.

Other Characters:

Sarah: Anthony's older sister. She's shallow, liking only what's popular, and is a real brat (I won't write the word originally used to describe her that was used by the person who created her) towards Anthony. Always dyes her hair to whatever hair color is popular.

Anna: Anthony's younger sister. 15 years old. Just started the swim team 3 months ago. She has a long, straight golden hair, average eyes, pointy nose, and her mouth is not big, but not small, and she always smile in front of people, and giggles as she talks, which makes her look cute on the face. She is thin, and moderately short, around 160+cm in height, she has the breast of C-cup sized, it's not that big. She is also good in sports, and intelligent in her work, and she is popular among her age group, but not exactly as popular as school models. She looks up to and respects Anthony. She loves anime and video games. She wears a wide variety of clothes, but wears a green one-piece bathing suit while swimming

Andy: Anthony's younger brother. 13 years old. Loves video games. Has a crush on Bethany, although she doesn't know (more info will be added when someone expands upon it).

Zoey: Anthony's 10 year old sister. She likes her brother a lot, but not like a brother-complex. She likes her friends, and unlike Sarah, she doesn't like populars or following them. She has a short, light brown hair, amber-colored eyes and a smile that fits greatly on her face. She has normal breasts, not too big because she's so young. She wears mostly skirts and shirts, but she has some jeans, and sometimes she wears dresses, she loves all colors equally, and thus, she has many different colors of clothing. She likes candy (mainly chocolate), playing videogame, and she loves love stories. She hasn't found a person to like and admire like most of the girls her age have. Anthony likes her too and they've always gotten along. She has the personality of a cute 10 year innocent girl, she wouldn't do anything bad even if forced to. She knows her brother is a nice person and inspires in him. She loves being praised and is a hard worker. Would do everything for her brother.

Mia: Anthony's twin sister who gets along with him very well. Her favorite fictional character is Mia from the Fire Emblem series, because they share the same name, and similar personalities. She naturally has black hair, but always dyes it purple in order to be like her favorite character. She is almost always wearing a skirt or dress. She likes sports (one of the few kinds of things that she doesn't wear a skirt for), but can't stand cheerleaders. She is easily excitable, more so when she has some kind of sugar (which is why she usually isn't allowed by her family to have any when at home or out at a family event).

When she has some kind of sugar, then she gets so hyper that she sometimes starts pulling pranks, although they're never harmful. She is an odd mix of being a tomboy and girly-girl, but gets annoyed with girls who are complete girly-girls. Shares Anthony's love of the sword, anime, and video games, but because of how hyper she is, she hardly ever reads books, because she think they're too boring for the most part.. She's a little faster than Anthony, but a little weaker. She is also a couple minutes younger than him.

Tekki: Anthony's best friend. He's a genius, a loyal friend, and can be a bit random at times. He has white hair and brown eyes, is about a head shorter than Anthony, and just wears general clothes, as he doesn't have a preference.

Amy: She's been friends with Anthony ever since their first day of middle school. She is kind, loyal, and very talented. Her breasts are a good size for her age. She has long, brown hair that she keeps in a ponytail, with blue eyes. The clothes she likes to wear the most are a purple shirt with a black skirt or black shorts. She always wears either a pair of black, knee high boots, a pair of dark blue tennis shoes, or a pair of black high heels, but she always takes the ones she doesn't wear with her (In case she wants to wear another pair at some point) in a purple book bag that she carries around all the time, and who knows what else she has in the book bag?

Diana: Anthony's mother. (This is all for her for now, I'll update it if/when she is used again)

Gred: A relatively dumb, but extremely muscly and mean quarterback for the school team.

Nancy: The leader of Sarah's popular group and head cheerleader. Blond hair

Jenny: A girl who hangs out with Amy a lot. (In some storylines she can't stand Anthony, but he doesn't know that)

Brianna: 16 years old. She has long white hair, dark skin and bright green eyes. She wears a red, white, and blue jacket with a Puerto Rican flag on the backside. She also wears a pair of pitch black jeans and red and white chucks. Laid back, yet somehow, easily excitable. She loves video games.

If you create a character, then you must give the details about them, such as their appearance and personality.

In this story, you have just finished middle school. Note: Depending on the storyline, it is one day till the end of middle school.

Note: Starfighter364 gave me permission to do this, I am NOT copying from him.

Please add to the Arcana Heart section, I need someone to write them, WELL!

As of 03/22/12: Once Anthony summons a girl, he obtains their moves and abilities.
